 María Magdalena por más de 10 años se ha desempeñado como maestra y poco a poco ha sacado adelante a sus hijos. Su crédito es de consumo el cual utiliza para la educación de sus niños y suplir algunas necesidades del hogar que sea de gran importancia.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is a hard-working, entrepreneurial and enthusiastic woman.  She is a teacher and vice principal of Ane Fran School in the community of Palo Quemado.  She is a popular teacher and an excellent client.

María Magdalena has been working as a teacher for more than 10 years and she has gradually managed to get her children ahead in life.  She will use her loan to cover her children's education expenses and also some very important and necessary household expenses.

loans.use: to cover her children's education expenses and also some household expenses

loans.name: Walter David

texts.es:
Walter David tiene 28 años, es casada vive con la esposa y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Walter se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es superar la situacion economica.

Le gusta hacer deporte y ayudar a la esposa en el estudio.
texts.en:
Walter David is 28 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

This community bank is called 'Nuevo Horizonte' (New Horizon).  It is located in Cachely Grande, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Walter grows crops, especially corn, rice and beans.  He makes his purchases in "Hnos. Olivos" store each month and makes his sales in the street market in the same town.

Walter is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his work such as crop diseases.  His dream is to improve his financial situation.

Walter enjoys taking part in sports and helping his wife in her studies.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.en:
Maria Salome is 41 years old and lives in Tulcán, a city in northern Ecuador that is located on the border with Colombia. She is a single mother of two children, a daughter who is 22 years old and a son who is 17. She says she will do anything in her power to take care of her children.

Raising animals is an activity that Maria Salome has always liked. She buys and sells pigs at the livestock market to support her family. This is her first loan, and it will go towards the purchase of pigs.

With the help of a loan, Maria Salome hopes that she will be able to buy things for her family that they were never able to afford before. In the future she'd like to expand her market for pigs and provide her children with college educations.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sandra; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de botica y también el negocio de un kiosco de golosinas en la estación de trenes en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, en la botica su esposo trabaja y en el kiosco trabaja la socia desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y juntos sacan adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere mejorar la atención de su botica y también quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar medicinas para la botica y para comprar algunas golosinas para el kiosco.
                                                         
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of the "Siempre Adelante" community bank which is located in Ollantaytambo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Sandra is 28 years old, married, and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her pharmacy business.  She also has a candy kiosk in the train station in Ollantaytambo district.  Sandra's husband works in the pharmacy and she works in the candy kiosk, from 8.00am to 9.00pm.  Together they get their son ahead in life.

Sandra would like to improve her pharmacy business and also expand her candy kiosk.  She is requesting this loan to buy medicines for her pharmacy and some candies for her kiosk.

Sandra is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy medicines for her pharmacy and some candies for her kiosk

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Miriam; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella vende comida en la estación de trenes que va hacia el distrito de Machupicchu, ella prepara diferentes platos como arroz con pollo, caldos y asados de carne, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne, pollo y verduras.
                                                         
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Srta. Miriam, 23, is a member of the SIEMPRE ADELANTE community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

Srta. Miriam is single.  She operates a food business at the train station where passengers travel to and from Machu Picchu.  She makes various kinds of prepared meals: chicken and rice, grilled meats and hearty stews, for example.  She works from 8:00am to 2:00pm.  She wants to expand and improve the business.  She will use this loan to buy the supplies she needs to operate: rice, meat, chicken and vegetables.  

Srta. Miriam is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food business.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: La señora Teodora realiza la venta de queso y su esposo es albañil. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mayor cantidad de quesos para así satisfacer a su clientela. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Alto Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz, es casada y tiene cinco hijos. Teodora cliente se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que se le otorgaron ya que pudo mejorar y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Esta será la cuarta vez que su préstamo es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Sra. Teodora operates a retail cheese business and her husband is a construction worker.  She will use this loan to buy wholesale supplies of different cheeses to stock her business.  She lives in a house she owns in the Alto Irpavi neighborhood of La Paz.  She is married and has five children.  Teodora is grateful for the loans that she has received in the past because they have allowed her to support her business.  This loan will be her fourth one from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies of cheese for her food business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her general store.

loans.name: Jarin Yariel

texts.es:
Jarin, tiene 26 años de edad, es agricultor, es originario de la comarca llamada el Rodeo Localizada en Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí, es soltero. Esta actividad la ha realizado desde muy pequeño, el indica que mas bien es por tradición, ya que todos sus antepasados se han dedicado a la agricultura. De hecho en este nuevo ciclo de siembra cuenta con el apoyo de su hermano quien le ayudara a sembrar junto con el  para sacar adelante este cultivo.
Jarin esta satisfecho con el logro alcanzado gracias al primer préstamo recibido pues lo invirtió para sacar adelante su siembra de tomate, pudo pagar mano de obra, compro semillas de tomates, abono , fertilizantes, insecticidas para evitar propagación de plagas. 
El solicita el préstamo para darle mantenimiento al segundo ciclo de siembra de 8,000 plantas de tomates que tienen un mes de haber sido sembradas. El espera sacar una producción con calidad y que le genere rendimiento, para poderlo vender a un buen precio que le brinde ganancias, mejore su ventas y le permita seguir sembrar mas.
texts.en:
Jarin, 26 years old, is a farmer. He is originally from the area called Rodeo Localizada in Pueblo Nuevo, municipality of Esteli. He is single. He has been farming since he was very small. He says it is tradition; all of his ancestors farmed. In this new planting season, he will have the help of his brother, who is going to help him plant so that the crops can succeed.

Jarin is satisfied with his achievements, thanks to the first loan that he received. He used it to be successful in tomato planting. He was able to pay farmhands and purchase tomato seeds, manure, fertilizers, and insecticides to avoid plagues.

He is requesting this loan to maintain planting through the second growing season. He has 8,000 tomato plants that need to be planted within one month.

He hopes to produce a quality crop with a high yield so that he can sell at a good price that will bring in revenue. He wants to improve his sales, which will permit him to continue planting more.

loans.use: to be able to sow 8,000 tomato plants during the second planting season

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es: La señora Avelina se dedica a la venta de botellas de plástico. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de más botellas pues tiene clientes que le compran mucho. Vive en alquiler ubicada en la zona de Alto Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz, es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos. Avelina cliente se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que se le otorgaron ya que pudo mejorar y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Esta es la tercera vez que el crédito va a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Avelina sells plastic bottles. She needs this loan to purchase more bottles because she has customers who buy a lot. She lives in a rental in the Alto Irpavi zone in the city of La Paz. She is a single mother and has two children. Avelina is very happy with the loans she has received because she was able to improve and grow her working capital. This is the third time that she has received a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase plastic bottles for selling wholesale to her customers

loans.name: Giovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Giovana; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas, ella tiene un pequeño kiosco en la estación de trenes que van al distrito de Machupicchu que queda  a 4 horas de la ciudad de Cusco ya que Machupicchu es un lugar donde numerosos de turistas llegan cada año y es muy visitado ya que es un lugar hermoso para llenarse de energia,la socia trabaja desde las 3:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y por medio de este pequeño negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas como galletas, dulces, chupetes y chocolates al por mayor.  
                                                       
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Siempre Adelante (Always Moving Forward) Community Bank. The bank is located in the Ollantaytambo district in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

The member is Giovana. She is 40 years old and is married with four children. The member balances her daily life with the business of selling snacks. She has a small booth in the train station. [The trains] go to the Machupicchu district and stay four hours in the city of Cusco because Machupicchu is a place where many tourists visit each year. It is very popular because it is a beautiful place for refilling one's energy. The member works from 3 am to 9 pm. In the midst of running the tiny business she cares for her children. The member wants to grow her snack sales business. The member requests this loan to purchase snacks such as crackers, sweets, lollipops, and chocolates wholesale.

The member is happy to receive this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase snacks such as crackers, sweets, lollipops, and chocolates wholesale

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: La señora Sabina tiene un puesto de comida donde vende almuerzos y platos extras. El crédito lo requiere para la compra insumos como ser: Fideos, arroz, condimentos, carne, etc., para así satisfacer a su clientela. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Alto Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz, es viuda y tiene un hijo. Sabina cliente se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que se le otorgaron ya que pudo mejorar y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Esta es la tercera vez que su crédito pasa a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sabina has a food stand where she sells lunch and other meals. The loan she is requesting is to purchase ingredients such as pasta, rice, condiments, meat, etc. so that she can satisfy her customers. She lives in her own home that is located in the Alto Irpavi zone in the city of La Paz. She is a widow and has one son.

Sabina is very happy with the loans she has received because they allowed her to improve and increase her working capital. This is the third time she will receive a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as pasta, rice, meat, and vegetables for her food-sales stand

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Elsa; ella tiene 70 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en una empresa, ella ya es jubilada y en algunas ocasiones realiza ventas de artesanía en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, la socia quiere terminar de construir su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena y yeso.
                                                      
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Siempre Adelante (Always Moving Forward) Community Bank. The bank is located in the district of Ollantaytambo in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

The member is Elsa. She is 70 years old and is single. The member balances her daily life with the work of running a business. She is already retired and occasionally sells handicrafts in the district of Ollantaytambo. The member wants to finish construction on her house. The member requests this loan to purchase construction materials such as cement, sand, and plaster.

The member is happy to receive this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as cement, sand, and plaster

loans.name: Jorge David

texts.es:
Jorge David tiene 39 años, es soltero vive solo no tiene hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Jorge se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como la situacion economica. Su sueño es tener un negocio propio.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jorge David, 39, is single and childless.  He lives in Ecuador's Los Rios province.

Jorge belongs to NUEVO HORIZONTE, a community bank that operates near the town of Cachely Grande in the canton of Ventanas.  The bank specializes in loans to farmers and its members grow crops such as maize, rice and beans.  

Jorge, too, is a farmer and he grows maize, rice and beans.  He buys supplies for the farm at Hermanos Olivos every month and sells his crop at a market there.

Jorge is applying for a loan to buy seeds and manure for the farm.  The loan will help him buy the supplies he needs to operate.  He faces challenges such as the difficult economic situation.  His goal is to own his own business.

Jorge likes sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for his farming business.

loans.name: Cinthia Katherine

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Cinthia Katherine; ella tiene 22 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas, artesanías y gaseosas, ella tiene un kiosco en la estación de trenes en el distrito de Ollantaytambo y también la socia trabaja en un empresa que vende aceites de consumo, ella distribuye a las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 hasta las 7:00 p.m y el negocio de venta de golosinas, artesanías y gaseosas lo realiza su mama, la socia quiere seguir mejorando en su trabajo y ampliar el negocio de Kiosco. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas como chupetes, galletas, caramelos, gaseosas y artesanía al por mayor.
                                                        
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Srta. Cinthia Katherine, 22, is a member of the SIEMPRE ADELANTE community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

Srta. Cinthia is single.  She has a business selling candy, snacks and soft drinks that she operates from a kiosk at the train station in the Ollantaytambo neighborhood.  She also works for a cooking oil sales company, delivering cooking oil to local stores.  She works from 8:00am until 7:00pm while her mother tends her kiosk business.  She wants to expand the kiosk business, so she is applying for a loan to buy wholesale supplies of various snack products: lollipops, crackers, caramels, soft drinks, etc.  

Srta. Cinthia is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy wholesales supplies of candy and snacks for her retail business.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La señora Martha es empleada y vende verduras en el mercado Achumani. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de diferentes verduras ya que ella quiere iniciar su propio negocio y tener su propio puesto de verduras. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Koani de la ciudad de La Paz, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en Impro. Su deseo de independizarse y formar su propio negocio complace notablemente a Impro y estamos seguros que así será para los financiadotes de Kiva.
texts.en: Sra. Martha works for a vegetable vendor in the Achumani market.  She is applying for a loan because she wants to start her own vegetable sales business and she will use the money to buy vegetables to stock the business.  She lives in a house she owns in the Koani neighborhood of La Paz.  She is married and has two children.  This is her first Impro loan.  Her goal is to establish her own business with help from Impro and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to start her own vegetable sales business.

loans.name: German

texts.es: El Señor Germán , habita en la ciudad de Estelí, actualmente soltero, 60 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la agricultura. Inicio en esta actividad por tradición ya que sus padres se dedicaban a  lo mismo, el hizo una sociedad con un amigo que tenían mas experiencia que el en siembras, además el no contaba con capital suficientes para trabajar por si mismo. El hizo un  primer préstamo para sembrar tomates, gracias a ello saco una buen producción aunque los precios en el mercado estuvieron bajo el vendió su producto, incluso pudo invertir capital en unos de sus proyectos que logro realizar el cual era poner  un a pulpería de hecho hoy en día la tiene, es pequeña pero va funcionando muy bien .El solicita este préstamo para sembrar tomates para el segundo ciclo de siembras de hortalizas, va a sembrar con ayuda de su hermano, el espera  obtener buenas ganancias para posteriormente mejorar su pulpería, buscar tecnología para se mas eficiente y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y su finca. Pues el desea seguir sembrando en lo futuro.
texts.en:
Germán lives in the city of Estelí, is currently single, 60 years old, has 2 children and dedicates himself to farming.  He started in the business because it was a tradition, given that his parents were also farmers.  He made a partnership with a friend who had more experience than him with planting, and he also didn’t have enough capital to work on his own.  

He took his first loan in order to plant tomatoes and, thankfully, the yield was good and he sold his product even though the prices at the market were low.  In fact, he was able to invest capital into one of his projects that he managed to make a reality, which was to open a general store that he currently has today.  It is small, but is functioning very well.

He requests this loan to plant tomatoes for the second cycle of planting crops, which he will plant with his brother’s help.  He hopes to have good earnings from this, in order to then improve his general store.  He also wants to find technology to be more efficient, and improve the conditions of his home and farm.  He wants to continue planting crops in the future.

loans.use: plant tomatoes during the second cycle of planting crops.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 33 años de edad, ella vive con su novio y tres hijos en el distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. Esta es una zona rural de condición humilde, que no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos.

Rosa es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchos deseos de sacar adelante a su familia. Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes (harina, arroz, fideos, condimentos, azúcar, etc.) y bebidas en una pequeña bodega instalada en el interior de su domicilio, afortunadamente Rosa cuenta con clientes establecidos en su zona. Rosa también se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral, que luego comercializa en los caseríos cercanos al suyo.

Rosa solicita un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para surtir su bodega, además comprará alimento balanceado para su ganado y hará algunas mejoras en el interior de su casa, el dinero restante será de uso personal.

Rosa es una clienta conocida para Edpyme Alternativa y goza de un buen récord de pagos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 33 years old and lives with her boyfriend and three children in the district of Tambogrande – Piura.  This is a rural zone, with humble conditions, that does not count on all the basic services.

Rosa is a hard-working woman that has a great desire to help her family get ahead.  She dedicates herself to selling groceries (flour, rice, noodles, condiments, sugar, etc.) and beverages from a small general store located in her home.  Luckily, Rosa counts on established customers from her area.  Rosa also dedicates herself to raising sheep and poultry, which she then sells in the villages near hers.

Rosa requests a loan of 2000 new Peruvian Soles that she will invest into the purchase of groceries to supply her store.  In addition, she will buy balanced feed for her animals and will make some improvements to the interior of her house.  The remaining funds will be for personal use.  Rosa is a client known to Edpyme Alternativa, and she enjoys a good loan repayment history.

loans.use: buy groceries for her store, balanced feed for her animals, and improve her home.

loans.name: Kathlen Marvely

texts.es:
Kathlen, es comerciante D. ropa, vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 15 y 17 años D. edad, ella trabaja todos los días D. la semana, vendiendo prendas D. vestir por toda la zona donD. pueD. accesar fácilmente cerca D. su vivienda, tiene 10 años D. estar dedicada al comercio D. ropa.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar prendas, ropa interior, blusas, faldas, camisetas, ya que se le agotan y debe estar en constante inversión, pues llegan nuevos estilos D. los cuales debe mantener a disposición para los clientes.
El propósito D. ella es mantener el negocio, aumentar su rentabilidad y D. esta manera contribuir a mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Kathlen's business is selling clothes.  She lives with her husband and her two children who are 15 and 17.  She works every day of the week, selling clothes all around that area near her home which she is able to easily access.  She has been selling clothes for ten years.

Kathlen is requesting a loan to buy clothes: underwear, blouses, skirts and t-shirts, since she has run out of stock and needs to constantly invest in the business as new styles keep arriving and she must ensure she has them available for her customers.

Kathlen's goal is to keep her business running, increase her profitability and, in this way, contribute towards improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy underwear, blouses, skirts and t-shirts

loans.name: Veli

texts.en:
Veli comes from the small village of Tsikhisdziri, near Tbilisi. He is married and lives with his family – his wife, 27-year-old son, daughter-in-law and 2-year-old granddaughter.
Veli is requesting credit to purchase food (Lucerne) for livestock. At the moment, he has 10 calves. He raises them and then sells them at a higher price in nearby villages. He also has a minibus, which is used for calf transportation. Veli also uses it to transport other type of freight if there is an order from his or nearby villages for which he will get transportation fees.
Veli has to purchase feed for calves as soon as possible, as its price is low at the moment. It will go up little by little and reach the maximum by early fall. In September it will be 20 to 25 per cent higher than it is in June. Purchase of Lucerne in June will allow him to reduce his costs and this increases his profit. About half of the profit will be reinvested in the business in order to expand it. The other half will be used for financing daily family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase feed for calves.

loans.name: Lisbeth Vanesa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE ADELANTE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Lizbeth Vanesa; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de hotel, ella tiene un pequeño hotel en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y también la socia es guía de turismo y trabaja en forma independiente, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de hotel. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar el hotel para comprar camas y colchones.                                                        
                                                     
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lizbeth Vanesa is a member of the "Siempre Adelante" community bank which is located in Ollantaytambo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Lizbeth Vanesa is 26 years old and single.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her hotel business.  She owns a small hotel in Ollantaytambo district where she works from 6.00am to 9.00pm.  She is also a tourist guide and works independently.  She would like to expand and improve her hotel business.  She is requesting this loan to equip her hotel with beds and mattresses.

Lizbeth Vanesa is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy beds and mattresses to equip her hotel

loans.name: Blanca Marina

texts.en: Blanca Marina is 41 years old and married with two children. She lives in Tegucigalpa, Honduras where she has run a small convenience shop for the last two years. She runs this business six days a week, and sells refreshments, snacks, basic foodstuffs, and other standard household and hygiene products. She is requesting a loan of Lps. 8,000 to purchase merchandise for her small store.

loans.use: to purchase meats, cheeses, fruits, vegetables, basic grains, beans, cooking oil, butter, beverages, snacks, personal hygiene products, and household cleaning supplies.

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es: Este padre emprendedor se llama Francisco, su actividad es la venta de hielo actividad que inicio hace mas de 3 años, a pesar de que ha tenido problemas ya que algunas veces la energía no es muy estable y sus productos se dañan. Pero tiene un termo en donde puede guardar una parte de sus productos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de termos, bolsas, además tiene que proporcionarle mantenimiento a su frezer.
texts.en: This entrepreneurial father is called Francisco, and his business is the sale of ice.  He started this business more than three years ago.  He has had problems because sometimes the energy supply is not very stable and his products get damaged, but he has a vacuum thermos where he can save some of his products. The reason for this loan is for the purchase of thermoses and bags, he also has to conduct maintenance on his freezer.

loans.use: to purchase vacuum thermoses and bags, he also has to conduct maintenance on his freezer.

loans.name: Ytamar

texts.es:
Ytamar de 64 años de edad, tiene su casa propia donde vive con su esposo, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Saqa que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

La actividad que desarrolla Ytamar es la crianza y venta de ganado caprino (cabras y chivos), desde hace algunos años, el lugar donde cría  sus animales en la parte posterior de la casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada  y pastos naturales, una vez que tengan el tamaño y el peso ideal los oferta en los distintos mercados, ya que cuenta con su propia clientela en la ciudad de Chiclayo.  Esto le permite obtener mayores ganacias para cubrir sus necesidades diarias.  

Ytamar solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar el alimento para sus animales y mejorar su corral, lo que le permitirá tenerlos bien alimentados  para venderlos a un mejor precio. Ytamar  es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donde vive porque es una persona que siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de los suyos y trata de tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ytamar, 64 years of age, has her own house where she lives with her husband.  The house only has electrical service, and is located in a rural zone in the Saga district of the province of Chiclayo.  These areas dedicate themselves to farming and raising livestock.

Ytamar has carried out the activity of raising and selling goats for some years.  She keeps them behind her house, gives them balanced feed and natural grasses and, once they are the right size and weight, she offers them at the different markets since she has her own customers in the city of Chiclayo.  This allows her to obtain more profits to cover her daily necessities.

Ytama requests a loan of 1500 new Peruvian Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy feed for her animals and improve her corral.  This will allow her to keep her animals well fed to sell them at better prices.  Ytamar is a person who is well known where she lives because she always preoccupies herself with the well being of her family and tries to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: buy balanced feed and repair her corral.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 23 años de edad, es madre soltera de un pequeño niño. Vive en casa de sus padres  en el distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. Elizabeth es una mujer que lucha por el bienestar de su hijo y cuenta con el apoyo constante de sus padres. 

Elizabeth se dedica a la venta de comida, jugos, gaseosas y golosinas en un  kiosco instalado en su hogar. Ella atiende permanentemente a la clientela fija con la que cuenta, la mayoría de ellos son pobladores de su comunidad y la conocen por ser una mujer emprendedora y con voluntad para  ayudar. Elizabeth cuenta con este negocio desde hace 3 años y se siente muy contenta con el pues le ha traído satisfacciones.

Ella desea invertir en su negocio y ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar una fotocopiadora que instalará en su kiosco. Elizabeth sabe que  existe una gran demanda para este servicio y por lo tanto quiere contar con este.

Elizabeth es una clienta conocida para nuestra entidad y ha cancelado adecuadamente  los créditos que le hemos concedidos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 23 years old and the single mother of a small boy.  She lives in her parents' home in Tambogrande district, Piura.  Elizabeth is a woman who strives to improve the well-being of her son and has the constant support of her parents.

Elizabeth's business is selling food, juice, soda and candies from a kiosk located in her home.  She is always serving her regular customers.  Most of her customers are people who live in her community.  They know her as an entrepreneurial woman who wants to help.  Elizabeth has owned this business for three years and she feels very happy as it has brought her satisfaction.

Elizabeth would like to invest in her business and so she has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a photocopier that she will set up in her kiosk.  Elizabeth knows that there is a great demand for this service and so would like to have a machine available.

Elizabeth is an existing client of our institution who has repaid her previous loans properly.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier for her business

loans.name: Mirna Del Socorrro

texts.es:
La señora Mirna del Socorro es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien es docente en la escuela rural de Caña de Castilla. Ella es casada con el señor Benito quien se dedica a la agricultura y tiene cuatro hijos los cuales son su inspiración. 

El crédito de ella es personal ella lo utilizara para mejoras de la infraestructura del hogar.
texts.en:
Mirna del Socorro is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman.  She is a teacher at a rural elementary school in Caña de Castilla.  She is married to Benito, who works in agriculture, and has four children who are her inspiration.

This loan is for personal use.  Mirna del Socorro will use the loan to make improvements to her home's infrastructure.

loans.use: to improve her home's infrastucture (roof)

loans.name: Prudencia

texts.es: La señora Prudencia realiza el trabajo de recolectar arena en una arenera. El crédito lo requiere para abrir un pequeño taller de sombrereria y necesita comprar el material para los sombreros, como ser tafelete, soste y forros. Vive en alquiler ubicada en la zona de Alto Irpavi II de la ciudad de La Paz, es casada y tiene un hijo.
texts.en: Prudencia works gathering sand in a sand mine.  She wants this loan to open a small hat workshop; she needs to buy the raw materials to make hats such as sweatbands, supports and lining.  She lives in a rented home located in the Alto Irpavi II neighborhood of the city of La Paz.  She is married and has one child.

loans.use: to buy materials to make hats

loans.name: Amigos Emprendedores Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMIGOS EMPRENDEDORES”; La socia vive en el distrito D. Huanchac en la provincia D. Cusco,  departamento del Cusco.

La  socia Victoria; tiene 44 años D. edad y La socia es separada y tiene 3 hijos y la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia alterna sus actividades con la venta D. caramelos en la carreta y ella también tiene un stand D. compra y venta D. libros, la socia trabaja en este negocio desD. hace 3 años, la socia desea en esta ocasión invertir el crédito en la adquisición D. un grupo D. libros para la venta. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. libros para la venta.

Los otros socios se dedican a la venta D. libros, un socio hace pre ventas en telefónica, otros dos socios tienen una flota D. taxis y los otros socios son empleados D. la empresa y hacen la labor D. operadores y recepcionistas, venta D. caramelos.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad D. vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the communal bank "Amigos Emprendedores".  She lives in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.  

Victoria is 44 years old and separated.  She has 3 children and works in retail.  She alternates her daily activities with her cart candy sales.  She has a stand also where she sells books.  She has been running this business for 3 years.  She is requesting a loan to purchase books to sell.  

The other members sell books, candy,  one works in telemarketing, two others have a fleet of taxis and the other members are employees who work as drivers and receptionists.  

Victoria values and is infinitely grateful for the loan granted since this will allow her grow with her business and improve her quality of life.  She is also committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: purchase books to sell.

loans.name: Luciano Felix

texts.es:
Luciano es un cliente de 51 años de edad, vive con su esposa y tres hijos en casa propia  ubicada en la comunidad rural del distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. La casa de Luciano no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos.

Luciano tiene muchos deseos de sacar adelante a su familia y darles una mejor calidad de vida, es por ello que trabaja arduamente criando sus ganados (ovino y vacuno), dándoles el mejor cuidado para que estos produzcan leche de calidad que él pueda comercializar al mejor precio. A pesar de la gran competencia que Luciano tiene en la zona, este cuenta con clientes establecidos que prefieren su producto.

Luciano solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles para comprarle alimento balanceado a sus ganados. Estos necesitan con suma importancia este alimento porque de ello depende la buena calidad de su leche. Esta inversión le permitirá a Luciano seguir creciendo en su actividad y cumplir sus metas.

Luciano ya ha trabajado con nuestra entidad y presenta un óptimo historial crediticio.
texts.en:
Luciano is a 51 year-old client who lives with his wife and three children in his own home which is located in a rural community in Tambogrande district, Piura.  Luciano's house does not receive all basic services.

Luciano has a great desire to get his family ahead and provide them with a better quality of life.  For this reason, he works hard raising his livestock (sheep and cows), providing them with the best of care so that they produce top-quality milk that he can sell for a good price.  In spite of the fact that he has a lot of competition in his area, Luciano has regular customers who prefer his product.

Luciano is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for his animals.  They really need this food because the good quality of their milk depends on it.  This investment will allow Luciano to continue growing in his business and achieving his goals.

Luciano has previously worked with our institution and he has a perfect credit history.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia tiene 55 años D. edad y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo D. enfermera en un hospital en la ciudad D. Cusco, ella trabaja desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y por medio D. este trabajo ella quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, uno D. sus hijos está estudiando economía en una D. las universidades D. la ciudad D. Cusco, la socia quiere que su hijo termine D. estudiar y que sea un profesional D. éxito. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar las mensualidades D. la universidad D. su hijo. 
                                                       
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
This client is a member of the "Yahuar Maqui" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The client is 55 years old, widowed, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her work as a nurse in a hospital in the city of Cusco.  She works from 8.00am to 5.00pm and, through her work, she would like to get her children ahead in life.  One of her children is studying Economics in one of the universities in the city of Cusco.  She would like her son to finish his studies and become a successful professional.  The client is requesting this loan to cover for her son's monthly tuition fees.

The client is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to pay her son's monthly tuition fees at university

loans.name: Maria Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es una clienta de 33 años de edad que vive con su esposo e hijo en una casa alquilada en el distrito de Chepen – La Libertad.  En este hogar prima una buena relación familiar. Existe una ayuda mutua entre Manuela y su esposo que contribuye al pleno desarrollo de sus actividades.

Manuela se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 10 años. Ella cuenta con un puesto de prendas de vestir en una de las avenidas más concurridas de su localidad. Manuela tiene clientes establecidos que están muy contentos con la calidad de su servicio y productos. El esposo de Manuela es mototaxista y ambos contribuyen con el desarrollo económico de su hogar.

Manuela solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles para completar los ahorros que ella y su esposo tienen para comprar una mototaxi (moto con cabina en parte trasera para el transporte de pasajeros) que  su esposo utilizará para brindar este servicio de transporte público, pues actualmente este trabaja con una moto alquilada. 

Manuela es una clienta muy responsable pues el crédito que nuestra entidad le concedió anteriormente, lo canceló sin un día de atraso. Esta inversión permitirá el desarrollo económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuela is a 33 year-old client who lives with her husband and son in a rental house in Chepen district, La Libertad.  There is a good family relationship in this household.  Manuela and her husband help each other and this enables them to make full progress in their business activities.

Manuela has been selling clothes for ten years.  She has a clothing stall in one of the busiest avenues in her town.  She has regular customers who are very happy with the quality of her service and products.  Manuela's husband is a motorcycle taxi driver and they both contribute to the financial progress of their household.

Manuela is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to put together with some savings that she and her husband have made, so that they can buy a motorcycle taxi (a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting passengers) that her husband will use to provide a public transport service as, right now, he rents his vehicle.

Manuela is a very responsible client as she repaid her previous loan from us without a single day's delay.  This investment will allow her family to make progress financially.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Danaire

texts.es: Donaire is 27 years old and lives in Tegucigalpa, Honduras with his wife. He operates a small convenience shop seven days a week in an area called "Flor del Campo." In this business he mainly sells meats and dairy products, though also sells basic foodstuffs and hygiene and cleaning supplies. He is requesting a loan of Lps. 20,000 to purchase merchandise for his store.
texts.en: Donaire is 27 years old and lives in Tegucigalpa, Honduras with his wife. He operates a small convenience shop seven days a week in an area called "Flor del Campo." In this business he mainly sells meats and dairy products, though also sells basic foodstuffs and hygiene and cleaning supplies. He is requesting a loan of Lps. 20,000 to purchase merchandise for his store.

loans.use: This loan will be used to purchase chicken, sausage, basic grains, dairy products, cooking oil, vegetables, fruits, cleaning supplies, and personal hygiene products.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia, vive con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales y tiene un molino de nixtamal, con este brinda el servicio a los vecinos y amigos para moler el maíz para hacer tortillas.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la reparación de un pozo de agua, ya que inicia el invierno y quiere tenerlo en buenas condiciones para evitar cualquier incidente,  también comprar materiales para la preparación de tamales, como pollo, aceite, verduras, maíz, este financiamiento será una gran ayuda, porque estará más segura con el pozo, además tendrá lo necesario para preparar su venta.
Su objetivo es mejorar la producción en su negocio, también a través de sus ventas mejorar los ingresos y mejorar la vivienda.
texts.en:
Antonia lives with her husband.  She sells tamales and has a corn mill, with which she provides a service to friends and neighbors by grinding corn to make tortillas.

She is requesting a loan to repair a water well, as winter is coming and she wants to have it in good condition to avoid any incidents.  She will also buy ingredients for the preparation of tamales, such as chicken, oil, vegetables,and corn.  This funding will a great help because the well will be more reliable and she will also have what she needs to prepare her products for sale.

Her goal is to increase production in her business and in addition, to improve her income and her housing situation as a result of her sales.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing tamales, such as chicken, oil, vegetables and corn, and the repair of a well.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 39 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de carros, ella vende carros en forma independiente, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de carros. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar llantas para los carros. 
                                                       
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Yahuar Maqui” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.  

She is 39 years old, has a spouse and three children.  She alternates her daily chores with the purchase and sales of cars.  She sells cars independently.  She works from 7am until 2pm and supports her children with this work.  She wants to expand the business and is asking for a loan to buy tires for the cars.

She is happy about the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis Enrique es un joven emprendedor de 22 años de edad. Vive con su novia e hijo en una casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pítipo en la provincia de Ferreñafe – Lambayeque. La comunidad donde Luis Enrique vive es rural y de condición humilde,  la mayoría de hogares no cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz, agua y desagüe.

Luis Enrique se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad, en una bodega instalada al interior de su domicilio. Luis Enrique desea progresar en ambos negocios y por lo tanto invertirá en ellos. Por eso solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1300 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de animales para extender su ganado y en la compra de abarrotes para surtir su bodega.

Luis Enrique cuenta con un buen número de clientes, para ambos negocios y sabe que esta inversión le será de gran utilidad. Es por ello que estaría muy agradecido de concedérsele el crédito. Luis Enrique ya ha trabajado con nuestra entidad y tiene buenas referencias crediticias.
texts.en:
Luis Enrique is a 22 year-old entrepreneur who lives with his girlfriend and son in his own home which is located in Pítipo district, in Ferreñafe province, Lambayeque.  The community where Luis Enrique lives is poor and rural.  Most homes do not have basic services of electricity, water and sewerage.

Luis Enrique's business is raising livestock and selling basic household products from a grocery store located in his home.  Luis Enrique would like to make progress in both businesses and so he will invest in them.  He is requesting a loan for 1,300 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he will invest in buying animals in order to increase his number of livestock.  He will also buy groceries with which to stock his store.

Luis Enrique has a good number of customers for both of his businesses and he knows that this investment will be very useful.  For this reason, he  would be very grateful to receive this loan.  Luis Enrique has worked with our institution before and he has a good credit record.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed and to stock his grocery store

loans.name: Ana Suheildy

texts.es: Ana Suheildy se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Ella ha puesto mucho empeño por mejorar su negocio, por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos para su negocio. Ella se levanta temprano para alistar su bolso en donde prepara todos los productos que le mostrara a sus diferentes clientes, por lo que siempre está pendiente de lo que ellos le solicitan. Es por este motivo que solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como bolsos, calzado, ropa,  cosméticos, entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Ana Suheildy's business is selling general merchandise.  She has been in this business for more than four years.  Ana has put a lot of effort into improving her business and this is not the first time that she has taken out a business loan.

Ana gets up early each day to get her bag ready with all the products that she will show her different customers.  She always pays attention to what her customers are requesting.

Ana is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as bags, footwear, clothes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bags, footwear, clothes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Narcisa Elizabeth

texts.en:
Narcisa Elizabeth is 29 years old and lives near the city of Cayambe in northern Ecuador. She lives with her parents and her six-year-old daughter.

Planting vegetables and raising chickens for household consumption is a family tradition for Narcisa Elizabeth. When she was younger, she would work in the fields with her parents because Narcisa Elizabeth was the only help they had. Trying to improve her future, Narcisa Elizabeth's parents made a huge effort to send her to college but after three years of studying her parents could no longer support her education.

She later married, gave birth to her daughter and divorced her husband. Without the support of her husband, Narcisa Elizabeth became the sole breadwinner for her daughter. Narcisa Elizabeth wanted to plant more crops to support her family but did not have enough money to increase production. She then found a flyer publicizing small loans from FODEMI.

With the money from her loan, Narcisa Elizabeth wants to expand her vegetable crops and raise more chickens for consumption and to sell them at the market. She believes that her loan will help her improve her farm, her economic status and the family's quality of life.

Narcisa Elizabeth hopes to fulfill her dream of seeing her daughter study and obtain a professional career. She is grateful for the help this loan will provide and hopes to get more loans in the future to proceed toward her goals.

loans.use: to expand her vegetable crops and raise more chickens.

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es:
El señor José Alejandro es una persona trabajador y emprendedor quien es contador público de una empresa desde hace 10 años. Él es casado, tiene cuatro hijos por los cuales vela y su mayor sueño es que sean profesionales.
El crédito de José es personal el cual utilizara para gastos de estudio de sus hijos y reparaciones del hogar en especial en el techo que tiene muchas goteras.
texts.en:
José Alejandro is a hard working, enterprising person.  He has been a Public Accountant in a firm for 10 years.  He’s married and has four children that he watches over and his greatest wish is that they become professionals.

José’s loan is personal.  He will use it to pay for his children’s educational expenses and to do some home repairs, especially the roof which has a lot of leaks.

loans.use: to pay his children's educational expenses and to repair his house's roof.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 31 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta mochilas, ella vende los sabados y domingos en el baratillo que es un lugar donde venden ropa, zapatos entre otras cosas, también la socia se dedica a realizar manualidades en cerámica en frio, ella hace diferentes trabajos como muñecas, animalitos  entre otros trabajos, ella trabaja para contratos, por medio de estos trabajos la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de mochilas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mochilas y materiales para hacer la cerámica.
                                                        
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Yahuar Maqui” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.

She is 31 years old, single and has a son.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of backpacks.  She sells every Saturday and Sunday at the "Baratillo” which is a place where they sell clothes and shoes, among other things.  She also makes unbaked ceramics.  She makes different items like dolls and little animals, among others.  She works with contracts and these jobs help her support her son.  She wants to expand the backpack selling business and is asking for the loan to buy backpacks and supplies to make ceramics.

She is happy with the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy backpacks and supplies to make ceramics.

loans.name: Eduin Alberto

texts.es:
Eduin Alberto es un joven campesino de 32 años de edad que acompañado por su esposa se ha dedicado a la producción agropecuaria, cultivo de árboles frutales, así como la cría de peces y pollos, lo que se ha convertido en la fuente de sustento para su familia. 

En el futuro, este emprendedor espera tener su propio terreno para realizar dichas labores, pues en el que actualmente trabaja es arrendado, por ahora y mientras trabaja incansablemente para lograrlo, necesita de un préstamo para comprar insumos para sus cultivos, concentrado para pollos y concentrado para peces lo que le permitirá mejorar la calidad de su producción y así generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Eduin Alberto is a young agricultural worker of 32 who, together with his wife, works in the farming business.  He grows fruit trees and also raises fish and chickens.  He has turned this into a source of support for his family.

In the future, this entrepreneur hopes to own his own plot of land on which to carry out his work as he currently works on land which he rents.  Right now, while he works tirelessly to achieve his goal, he needs a loan to buy supplies for his crops and feed concentrate for his chickens and fish.  This will enable him to improve the quality of his production and thereby make more income.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops and feed concentrate for his chickens and fish

loans.name: Santos Remigio

texts.es:
Santos tiene 32 años de edad esta casado y vive con su esposa y dos hijos en el distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. Esta es una zona rural cuya actividad principal es la ganadería y agricultura.

Santos se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza de ganado ovino, teniendo actualmente 25 ovejas a su cargo, las cuales comercializa a los pobladores de su zona y en el mercado local, una vez que estas alcancen tamaño y peso ideal. Adicionalmente Santos se dedica a la agricultura, posee terreno agrícola en el cual siembra limón  y mango. Ambas cosechas están en producción, el limón lo cultiva semanalmente mientras que el mango sale por campaña.

Santos cuenta con clientela establecida a la cual quiere seguir satisfaciendo con sus productos, es por ello que desea invertir en el bienestar de su ganado y cultivos. Santos solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles para comprarle alimento balanceado a sus ovejas y fertilizantes para sus cultivos de mango y limón. Esto le garantizará una buena producción en ambos sectores y las ganancias obtenidas por Santos le serán de suma utilidad para el bienestar de su familia.

Santo ya ha trabajado con nuestra entidad y cuenta con buenas referencias crediticias.
texts.en:
Santos is 32 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children in Tambogrande district, Piura.  This is a rural area whose main business activities are livestock raising and farming.

For several years, Santos has been raising sheep.  He currently cares for 25 sheep which he sells to the residents of his area and in the local market once they have reached an ideal size and weight.  Santos also farms.  He owns farmland where he grows lemons and mangos.  He is currently growing both these products.  He grows the lemons weekly and the mangos seasonally.

Santos has regular customers who he would like to continue satisfying with his products.  For this reason, he would like to invest in the care of his cattle and crops.  Santos is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for his sheep and also fertilizers for his mango and lemon crops.  This will guarantee him good production in both areas and the profits he makes will be extremely important in improving his family's well-being.  Santos has worked with our institution before and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed and also fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Elmer

texts.es:
Elmer es un cliente recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa, el tiene  28 años de edad y 2 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Pitipo. Esta es una comunidad tranquila dedicada sobre todo a la agricultura y ganadería.

Elmer se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado vacuno lechero, tiene varios años de experiencia en este negocio y lo ha sabido conducir bien. Las ganancias que Elmer obtiene son destinadas totalmente a sus hijos. Además,  Elmer cuenta con una mototaxi en la cual realiza un servicio de transporte público que le genera ingresos adicionales.

Elmer solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar una cabeza de ganado vacuno, la cual engordará y venderá a posteriori. Este será el primer paso para ampliar su negocio. Elmer tiene muchos deseos de superación pues quiere darles a sus hijos la mejor educación y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elmer is an existing client of Edpyme Alternativa.  He is 28 years old and has two children in his care.  Elmer lives in his parents' home which is located in the rural area of Pítipo district.  This is a quiet community where people mainly farm and raise lifestock.

Elmer's business is buying and selling dairy cattle.  He has several years experience in his business and he has known how to run it well.  Elmer directs all of the profits that he makes towards his children.  He also owns a motorcycle taxi with which he provides a public transport service.  This makes him additional income.

Elmer is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a head of cattle which he will fatten and later sell.  This will be his first step in expanding his business.  Elmer has a great desire to improve himself as he would like to provide his children with the best education and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Donald

texts.es:
Donald, de 30 años de edad, soltero,  de oficio comerciante, se dedica a vender accesorios de celulares relojes, lentes, el es originario de Estelí. El dice que su primer préstamo le ayudo en gran manera pues pudo hacer mas clientes, adquirir mas mercadería para surtir su venta de accesorios mejoraron sus ventas y ofreció mas variedad de producto.
El solicita este préstamo para comprar más mercadería para su negocio de celulares. El esta trabajando con su mama en este negocio de ventas de accesorios de celulares. Esta inversión le será de gran ayuda porque espera obtener mejores ganancias y poder llevar más ingresos a su hogar. Le gustaría seguir trabajando cada día mas pues desea lograr una de sus mas anheladas metas que es tener su propia tienda de ventas de accesorios para celular y mercadería en general para ya no ser un vendedor ambulante y estar en un lugar fijo.
texts.en:
Donald is 30 years old, single and works as a merchant selling cell phone accessories, watches and glasses.  He is a native of Estelí.  

He says that his first loan helped him greatly as he was able to increase his customers, purchase more accessories to stock his business, improve his sales and offer a larger variety of products.  He is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise for his cell phone business.  His mother also works with him. 

This loan will be a great help to him because he hopes to increase his earnings and be able to bring more money home.  He would like to continue working everyday because he wants to achieve one of his most desired goals; to have his own store for his cell phone accessory and general merchandise sales.  This way he won't have to be a street vendor and will be able to have a fixed location.

loans.use: purchase more merchandise for his cell phone sales business.

loans.name: Carlos Augusto

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 30 años de edad, vive en casa de sus padres en una comunidad urbana en vías de desarrollo perteneciente  a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Carlos es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso en su labor.

La actividad que desarrolla es el servicio de enllante y desenllante al público en general dentro de su vivienda. Esta actividad, que no le permite tener muchas comodidades pero sí subsistir, la viene desarrollando desde hace 7 años y cuenta con clientes fijos, quienes están satisfechos con el servicio que Carlos brinda.

Carlos solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles para hacer mejoras dentro de su vivienda, pues esta la necesita, esto le permitirá a Carlos y a sus padres mejorar la calidad de vida que hasta ahora tienen.

Carlos es un cliente recurrente de nuestra entidad y ha cancelado todos sus pagos adecuadamente. Él estaría muy agradecido de concedérsele el crédito pues le sería de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Carlos is 30 years old and lives in his parents' home in a developing, urban community, in Chiclayo province.  He is a hard-working man who is committed to his work.

Carlos provides a tire change service to the general public from his home.  This business does not allow him to enjoy many comforts in life but it does allow him to survive.  He has been in the business for seven years and he has regular customers who are satisfied with the service that he provides.

Carlos is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to make some necessary improvements to the inside of his home.  This will allow Carlos and his parents to improve their quality of life.

Carlos is an existing client of our institution who has made all his previous loan repayments properly.  He would be very grateful to receive this loan as it will be a great help to him.

loans.use: to improve the inside of his home

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 34 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el hace servicio de taxi y trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, el hace servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco, el socio por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de servicio de taxi. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para su carro. 
                                                   
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This client belongs to the "Yahuar Maqui" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The client is 34 years old, single, and has one child.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his transport business.  He provides a taxi service and works from 7.00am to 10.00pm.  He provides a taxi service in the streets of the city of Cusco.  Through this business, he gets his child ahead in life.  The client would like to expand his taxi service.  He is requesting this loan to buy spare parts for his car.

The client is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his car

loans.name: Eddy Vidal

texts.es:
Eddy Vidal tiene 30 años, vive en Union Libre vive con la compañera y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Eddy se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos y la falta de terreno propio. Su sueño es comprar un terreno.

Le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
Eddy Vidal is 30 years old.  He lives with his partner and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

This community bank is called "Nuevo Horizonte" (New Horizon).  It is located in Cachely Grande, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Eddy grows crops, especially corn, rice and beans.  He makes his purchases in "Hnos. Olivos" store each month and makes his sales in the street market in the same town.

Eddy is requesting this loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his work such as crop diseases and the fact that he doesn't own his own land.  His dream is to buy a plot of land.

Eddy enjoys playing indoor soccer.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 51 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de alquiler de sonido, el socio alquila en diferentes eventos como matrimonios, cumpleaños y bautizos, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de alquiler de sonido. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar parlantes y algunos repuestos para los equipos de sonidos. 
                                                  
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Yahuar Maqui" located in the district, province and department of Cusco.  

He is 51 years old, lives with his partner and has 3 children.  He alternates his daily activities with his sound system services business.  He works various events such as weddings, birthdays and baptisms. Through this business he is able to provide for his children.  He wants to expand his sound business, so he is requesting a loan to buy speakers and spare parts for his sound system 
                                                  
He is happy about the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: purchase speakers and spare parts for his sound system.

loans.name: Valiko

texts.en:
Valiko is 53 years old and lives in the village of Tsintskaro, Kartli Region. He is married and lives with his wife Mary, 27-year-old son, daughter-in-law and 2-year-old granddaughter.
Valiko is a taxi driver. He drives his own car and earns approximately 500 Laris per month. Recently, the number of customers has decreased because he has had to charge higher prices for his service because of the petrol price increase. Not many villagers can afford to use the taxi service at a higher price. Because of the abovementioned problem, Valiko has decided to change his taxi's fuel system from petrol to gas, which is cheaper than petrol and will reduce the cost of transportation by 40 to 45 per cent. It will allow Valiko to decrease the price of the service, which will attract many customers. Increasing the number of customers and cutting his costs will positively affect his profit. He will pay a local auto service center to change the fuel system. The increased income will be used for family wellbeing.

loans.use: to pay for a fuel system change for his taxi.

loans.name: Resurection Plus Group

texts.en:
Mamie, aged 52, is the chairwoman of the Community Bank “Resurrection Plus,” which is composed of 10 members united in solidarity to receive loans from Kiva through the MFI HOPE RDC with the goal of developing their businesses. 

Mamie has been active in her business since 1994 selling secondhand clothing. Today, she has diversified it by adding smoked and salted fish at the market located west of the city of Kinshasa. She is a loyal client of the MFI HOPE RDC who has already received eight different loans and has repaid them properly. As the fish demand is high in her community, she intends to use the next loan to increase the fish stock and resell them with the aim of increasing her profits. Each week, her business brings in a profit of $70. 

Her ambition is to open a storage facility. Mamie is married and has five children, who are aged between 14 and 32 years old. Three of them go to school.

loans.use: to increase inventory of her goods by buying fish and reselling them at profit.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Hijas De Dios Group

texts.es:
El grupo las hijas de Dios lo conforman las señora María Elena, Guisssel y Veronica tres féminas trabajadoras y emprendedoras originarias de Masaya, ciudad de las flores. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora María Elena quien desde hace cinco años se dedica a la venta de gaseosa. Ella tiene la meta junto a su esposo de tener una pulpería.
Ella con el crédito comprar más gaseosa para su negocio. 
La señora Guissel vende chiverías, gaseosa y chicha, y Verónica tiene una pulpería la cual inicio con la venta de golosinas y poco a poco fue creciendo.
texts.en:
The group, Las Hijas de Dios (The Daughters of God), is comprised of María Elena, Guisssel, and Veronica, three hard-working and entrepreneurial women originally from Massaya, the city of flowers. The group's coordinator is María Elena, who has been selling soft drinks for five years. She and her husband have a goal to own a general store.

With the loan, she will buy more soft drinks for her business.

Guissel sells dairy products, soft drinks, and corn malt. Veronica has a general store that she started by selling snacks, and little by little it grew.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks

loans.name: Rosario Del Pilar

texts.es:
Rosario tiene  32 años de edad, vive con su esposo y  4 hijos,  en casa propia  ubicada en la parte rural del distrito de  Tambogrande – Piura.  Rosario es una mujer trabajadora que lucha por el bienestar de su familia.

La actividad que desarrolla Rosario es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo, la cual la realiza recorriendo los caseríos cercanos al suyo donde cuenta con  clientela  establecida a la que vende sus productos al crédito y al contado. Adicionalmente Rosario cría aves de corral, en su casa, para luego comercializarlas a los pobladores de su zona.

Rosario tiene muchos deseos de seguir creciendo en su negocio y por eso ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar mercadería (cosméticos) e incrementar sus ventas atendiendo los pedidos de sus clientas en menor tiempo. Además, otra parte del crédito serás destinada a la compra de alimento balanceado para sus aves de corral.

Rosario estaría muy agradecida de concedérsele el préstamo pues este le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos para el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosario, age 32, lives with her husband and their four children.  They live in their own house in the rural area of the Tambogrande-Piura district.  Rosario is a hard-working woman who makes every effort for her family’s well-being.

Rosario sells cosmetics by catalog.  She does this by going to the villages close to her own.  She has established customers in the villages, and she sells her products on credit and for cash.  Rosario also raises barnyard fowl at her house.  She later sells the fowl to the people living in her area.

Rosario has a lot of desire to keep growing in her business.  That is why she has believed it advisable to request a loan for 500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise (cosmetics).  She will increase her sales and take care of her customers’ orders in less time.  She will use part of the loan to buy balanced feed for her barnyard fowl.

Rosario will be very grateful to be granted the loan.  It will help her improve her income for her children’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and balanced feed for barnyard fowl.

loans.name: Lina María

texts.es:
Oriunda del Quindio, Colombia y con la ilusión de salir adelante, Lina María decidió viajar a la ciudad de Medellín para buscar mejores oportunidades y lograr conseguir un empleo que le permitiera mejorar su calidad de vida, fue entonces cuando motivada con su padre decidió darle vida a su propio negocio, una venta de tintos y mangos en el centro de la ciudad. 

La ilusión de mejorar sus ingresos la ha motivado a crecer su negocio, para ello necesita de un préstamo que le permita comprar un carrito para ubicar mejor los tintos y adquirir una máquina para cortar los mangos.
texts.en:
Originally from Quindio, Colombia, Lina María had a desire to get ahead in life and so decided to travel to the city of Medellín in search of better opportunities.  She hoped to find a job which would allow her to improve her quality of life.  Motivated by her father, she decided to start her own business selling coffee and mangos in the city center.

The desire to improve her income has motivated Lina María to grow her business.  For this, she needs a loan which will allow her to buy a cart where she can better keep her coffee and a machine for cutting mangos.

loans.use: to buy a cart for selling coffee and a machine for cutting mangos

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase antibiotic products needed by his customers.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Javier Coniglario

texts.es:
Javier Coniglario tiene 37 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Javier se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es terminar de educar a los hijos y aumentar la produccion.

Le gusta festejar las fiestas del recinto y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Javier Coniglario is 37 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children. They live in the Ventanas canton in the province of Los Rios.

This communal bank is called Nuevo Horizonte (New Horizon). It is located in the Cachely Grande precinct, with belongs to the Ventanas canton. This communal bank is dedicated to agricultural work, with short term loans for planting corn, rice, and beans.

Javier works in agriculture, especially in planting corn, rice, and beans. He makes his purchases at Hermanos Olivos (Olivos Brothers) store every month and sells his products at the fair in the same town.

He is applying for the loan to buy seeds and compost for his fields. The loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He faces challenges such as diseases in his crops. His dream is to complete the education of his children and increase his production.

He likes to celebrate the fiestas of the district and play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and compost for his fields

loans.name: Juana Evangelista

texts.es:
