Juana, vive con sus hijas y su esposo en casa familiar, ella vende meriendas desde hace 5 años, con la ayuda de su esposo y sus hijos atiende el negocio todos los días.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar materiales para la preparación de la venta, utilizando el fondo en aceite, condimentos, carnes, materiales plásticos, bebidas, esta inversión será la fortaleza para el negocio, ya que incrementara la producción.
Su objetivo es continuar en el negocio, dándole un buen mantenimiento, ofreciendo a los clientes mayor variedad de alimentos, con el fin de mejorar los ingresos y ganancias del hogar.
texts.en:
Juana lives with her children and her husband in the family home. She has been selling snacks for five years. With the help of her husband and her children, she attends to the business every day.

She is applying for a loan to buy ingredients for the preparation of the food she sells. Together with her stock of oil, condiments, meats, plastic goods, and drinks, this investment will be the strength of the business, since it will increase her production.

Her goal is to continue the business, maintaining it well, and offering her customers a greater variety of food, with the goal of improving her income and the household earnings.

loans.use: to buy oil, condiments, meats, plastic goods, and drinks.

loans.name: Fuerza 2008 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se denomina “Fuerza 2008” y está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que se reúnen cada treinta días en las oficinas de la Unidad de Microfinazas de la Asociación Arariwa Cusco, Perú.  
   
En esta reunión conocimos a la Sra. María Belén que nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Cusco y donde actualmente también vive, ella tiene 46 años y es madre y padre para sus dos hijos. Maria Belén es ama de casa que después de hacer sus actividades D. hogar tiene que trabajar, ella trabaja como secretaria en una agencia de viajes. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Maria Belén también tiene una pequeña pizzería que tiene de nombre “La Gran Pizza” y donde ya tiene trabajando casi cerca de 6 meses. Ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo jamón y queso. El sueño de Maria Belén es abrir una cadena de restaurantes. 

* La Sra. Maria Belén es la persona que está levantando la mano  en la fotografía.
texts.en: The "Fuerza 2008" group consists of responsible and hard-working people who get together every 30 days at the offices of Kiva partner Asociación Arariwa in Cusco, Peru. At the latest meeting, we got to know María Belén, who tells us she was born and still lives in Cusco. She is 46 years old and is both mother and father to her two children. After taking care of her household responsibilities, María works as a secretary at a travel agency. She has made a living in this activity for the past 15 years, and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. María also has a small pizzeria called "La Gran Pizza," where she has been working for nearly six months already. At this time, she is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients like ham and cheese. Her dream is to open a restaurant chain. *María is the woman raising her hand in the photo.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients (ham, cheese, etc.)

loans.name: Christian Ivan

texts.es:
Christian Ivan tiene 20 años, es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Christian se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como la falta de terreno ya que el alquiler es muy alto. Su sueño es comprar terrenos para sembrar.

Le gusta jugar boly.
texts.en: Christian Ivan is 20 years old, single, has no children and lives with his parents. He lives in the village of Ventanas, province of Los Ríos, Ecuador. He is part of the Nuevo Horizonte (New Horizons) community bank in the Cachely Grande precinct of Ventanas. This community bank is focused on short-cycle agriculture such as corn, rice and beans. Christian makes a living in agriculture, in particular farming corn, rice and beans. He makes his purchases every month at "Hermanos Olivos" and sells his products at the markets at the same location. He is requesting the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers for his crops. With the loan's support, he will be able to meet his economic needs. He confronts challenges like a lack of land since rent is very high. His dream is to buy land to farm. He enjoys playing volleyball.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 52 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos y desea que terminen de estudiar y sean profesionales ,las socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar las mensualidades de su estudio de sus hijos y para comprar productos para cocinar para el restaurant. 
                                                        
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member belongs to the "Yahuar Maqui" community bank in the district of Cusco, Peru. She is 52 years old, married and has four children. She dedicates herself to a restaurant business, preparing breakfasts, lunches and dinners from 6 a.m. until 10 p.m. Through this business she has been able to make headway for her children, whom she wants to see complete their education and become professionals. She wants to expand her restaurant and is requesting the loan to pay her children's monthly education bills and to purchase cooking products for her restaurant. She feels happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to pay her children's monthly education bills and to purchase cooking products for her restaurant.

loans.name: Miguel Ernesto

texts.es:
Miguel, es un agricultor, vive con su familia, su esposa y un hijo de dos años de edad, él trabaja sembrando frijol en un pequeño terreno, de este cultivo comercializa y consume también su familia. Miguel está iniciando las labores para la siembra de frijoles, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar semilla mejorada.
Este préstamo, significa mucho para él, pues es el único medio para llevar a cabo su trabajo, con el objetivo de tener un buen desarrollo en la plantación de frijol y generar al final una buena cosecha para comercializar.
Su sueño es algún día comprarse su propia casa, para vivir dignamente con su familia.
texts.en: Miguel works in agriculture.  He lives with his wife and their son who is two years old.  Miguel plants beans on a small plot of land.  He sells some of the crop and also helps to feed his family with it.   He is getting ready for the harvest and is requesting a loan to purchase better quality seeds.   The loan makes a significant difference to Miguel's success.  The new seeds will help him generate a good harvest to take to market.    Miguel's dream is to be able one day to buy his own house, and live with dignity with his family.

loans.use: To purchase better quality seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Jhon Henry

texts.es:
Jhon Henry es un joven emprendedor que asume los gastos del hogar donde vive con su madre, desde pequeño este emprendedor se sintió atraído por las ventas, fue entonces cuando estando apenas en el colegió decidió empezar a vender algunos dulces en su casa, después de graduarse y debido a la falta de oportunidades para continuar con sus estudios decidió crear su propia tienda la cual ha ido surtiendo poco a poco con las ganancias generadas. 

Actualmente Jhon Henry necesita de un préstamo para comprar surtido de carnes frías y pollo congelado debido a que en este tipo de productos para la demanda actual, este crédito se traducirá en mayores ingresos y así caminar poco a poco hasta convertir su sueño de tener un gran supermercado en una realidad.
texts.en: Jhon Henry is a young businessman who is responsible for the household expenses where he lives with his mother.  From the time he was young, Jhon was drawn towards sales.  It was then that he started selling a few sweets and snacks from his house while he was still in school.  After he finished school, and with little opportunity to continue his education, he decided to open his own shop where he slowly began to stock more and more everyday items such as groceries and household goods.   Today, Jhon is requesting the loan to purchase an assortment of frozen meats and chicken.  With the current demand for these items, this loan will translate into greater sales and income, so that little by little Jhon can convert his dream of having a large supermarket into a reality.

loans.use: to purchase frozen meat and chicken to sell

loans.name: Monica Stefania

texts.es:
Monica Stefania tiene 20 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Monica se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos, además le gustaría invertir un poco en la comprar de chanchos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como . Su sueño es comprar terrenos para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta limpiar la casa.
texts.en: Monica is 20 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and their children in a town called El Canton Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios.  This area is called Neuvo Horizonte, which means New Horizon, and it's known for its agriculture and its short harvest cycles for corn, rice and other crops.    Monica works in agriculture, specifically growing and harvesting corn, rice and beans, which she sells every month at the local market.   She is requesting this loan to purchase more seeds and fertilizers.  She would also like to use some of the money to purchase a few pigs.  The loan will help Monica's financial situation and help cover basic necessities.   Her dream is to be able to purchase some land which she could farm.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.  She would also like invest a little money to purchase several pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 26 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de librería y también el socio trabaja en construcción realizando acabados y pinturas para las construcción de casas y el negocio de librería lo realiza su esposo y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de librería. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería de librería como cuadernos, lapiceros, libros y lápices para la librería.
                                                   
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Yahuar Maqui" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 26 years old, lives with his partner, and has one child.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his stationery store business.  He also works in construction, doing finishing work and painting houses.  His wife works in the stationery store and together they get their children ahead in life.

The borrower would like to expand his stationery store business.  He is requesting this loan to buy stationery products such as composition books, pens, books and pencils.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy stationery products such as composition books, pens, books and pencils for his stationery store

loans.name: Jose Ausberto

texts.en: Jose is 55 years old and married with three children.  He lives in Tegucigalpa, Honduras where he has worked as a taxi driver for 25 years.  Jose is requesting a loan of HNL 10,000 with which to pay for vehicle repairs.

loans.use: This loan will be used for engine repairs to Jose's taxi.

loans.name: Beatriz Adelina

texts.es:
Beatriz Adelina tiene 40 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Beatriz se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz,ademas a la crianza y engorde de pollos, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos ademas de alimentacion para los pollos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es aumentar la produccion y construir un galpon.

Le gusta limpiar la casa y que este ordenada.
texts.en:
Beatriz Adelina is 40 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

This Communal Bank is called “Nuevo Horizonte” (New Horizon) and located in the neighborhood of Recinto Cachely Grande, which is in the canton of Ventanas. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Beatriz is a farmer who specializes in growing corn. In addition, she raises chickens for fattening. She buys her supplies at the Olivos Brothers Shopping Center each month and then sells her goods at the fair in the same location.

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, compost, as well as feed for her chickens. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. One of the challenges she faces is crop disease. Her dreams include increasing production and building a chicken coop.

Beatriz enjoys cleaning house and keeping it in order.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost, and poultry feed.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
De origen campesino, Francisco quien es oriundo del municipio de Sonsón en Antioquia vive en una finca en compañía de su esposa y sus dos hijos donde se desempeña como mayordomo, pues desde pequeño conoce muy bien los oficios propios del campo. Su buen desempeño como empleado y la confianza que ha depositado en él su jefe, lo hizo acreedor a un pedazo de tierra en el que sembró arveja, lo que le permite tener ingresos adicionales para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
 
Actualmente, Francisco necesita de un préstamo para comprar abonos e insecticidas para que su cultivo prospere y empezar a generar ganancias y caminar hacia lograr su sueño, tener su propia finca y cultivar diversos productos agropecuarios.
texts.en:
Francisco is a native of the town of Sonsón in Antioquia. He started out working as a field laborer, but now he is the foreman on a farm where he lives with his wife and two children. Francisco is very knowledgeable about the work required on a farm since he had to learn at a young age. He has grown tremendously as an employee and has earned the trust of his boss. Francisco acquired his own piece of land for growing peas. This allows him to earn additional income to improve his quality of life.

At the moment, Francisco needs a loan to buy compost and insecticides so that his crop can flourish and begin generating income. He continues to move forward toward his dream of having his own farm and cultivating various agricultural products.

loans.use: to purchase compost and insecticides.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 27 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de cafetín, ella prepara desayunos, sándwich y bebidas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m, la socia por medio de este negoció la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de cafetín. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carnes, pollo, panes y verduras.
                                                         
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank “Yahuar Maqui” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 27 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has two children. The member divides her time between her daily activities and operating a café. She prepares breakfasts, sandwiches, and beverages. The member works from 6am to 3pm. Through her business, she is able to succeed on behalf of her children. She wants to expand her café business, so she is requesting a loan to buy products for cooking such as meat, chicken, bread, and vegetables.

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase meat, chicken, bread, and vegetables.

loans.name: Darwin Oswaldo

texts.es:
Darwin Oswaldo tiene 26 años, es soltero vive con los padres. No tienen hijos.  Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Darwin se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol por mas de 8 años, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como el pago del arriendo del terreno. Su sueño es tener terrenos propios para dejar de pagar el arriendo.

Le gusta jugar futbool.
texts.en:
Darwin Oswaldo is 26 years old, single, and lives with his parents. He does not have children. Darwin resides in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

This Communal Bank is called “Nuevo Horizonte” (New Horizon) and located in the neighborhood of Recinto Cachely Grande, which is in the canton of Ventanas. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Darwin is a farmer who has been growing corn, rice, and beans for more than eight years. He buys his supplies at the Olivos Brothers Shopping Center each month and then sells his goods at the fair in the same location.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and compost for his crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. His challenges include making the rental payments on his land. Darwin dreams of having his own land so that he can stop paying rent.

He enjoys playing soccer.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loans.name: Edilia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, Edilia abre las puertas de su negocio, una tienda de productos propios de la canasta familiar ubicada en Medellín, el negocio aunque fue heredado de su padre es la única fuente de sustento de esta emprendedora quien sabe que aunque son largas horas las que debe trabajar para sacar adelante su negocio, es la manera como obtiene los ingresos para cubrir sus gastos personales. 
 
Edilia necesita de un préstamo para realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas y comprar mayor variedad de surtido para mejorar sus ingresos. En el futuro espera crecer su tienda para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Edilia has a store in Medellín where she sells household products. The doors of her business are open from 6am to 10pm. She inherited this business from her father and it is her only source of income. Despite having to work long hours, Edilia knows that it is necessary in order to get ahead in her business. This allows her to generate revenue so that she can cover her personal expenses.

Edilia needs a loan to make a few improvements to her store and purchase a variety of merchandise in bulk so that she can improve her earnings. In the future, she hopes to expand her store in order to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to make a few improvements to her store and to purchase a wide variety of merchandise in bulk.

loans.name: Las Cruces Group

texts.es:
El grupo las cruces lo conforman las señora Ana, Yahaira, Jovania, María y Enas, cinco mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras originarias de Masaya, ciudad de las flores. La coordinadora es la señora Ana quien desde hace más de tres años vende tortilla, carne asada y gaseosa en el km 14 ticuantepe. Ella invertirá el crédito en carne, carbón, maíz, cal, leña…etc.
Ana tiene el sueño de tener una comideria  con todo lo necesario.
La señora Yahaira es comerciante de cosméticos, cremas, perfumes y shampu, Jovania tiene una refresquería donde oferta frescos naturales, de lata y gaseosa, María tiene una tortillería y Ena vende perecederos.
texts.en:
The group “Las Cruces” (The Crosses) consists of Sras. Ana, Yahaira, Jovania, María, and Ena. These five hardworking and enterprising women are originally from Masaya, the city of flowers.

Sra. Ana is the group coordinator. She has been selling tortillas, roasted meats, and sodas for more than three years. Ana sells her products along Km 14 in Ticuantepe. She will invest her loan in meat, charcoal, corn, lime, firewood, and other supplies. Ana dreams of owning a diner that has everything she needs.

Sra. Yahira is a merchant who sells cosmetics, crèmes, perfumes, and shampoo. Jovania has a refreshment shop where she sells natural beverages, canned drinks, and sodas. Maria has a tortilla shop. Ena sells perishable goods.

loans.use: to purchase meat, charcoal, corn, lime, firewood, and other supplies.

loans.name: Wilmer Jaime

texts.es:
Wilmer Jaime tiene 28 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Wilmer se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, desde hace 10 años las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener un taller de agropecuria bien equipado para trabajar.

Le gusta rhacer mucho deporte por que le fasina en futbool.
texts.en:
Wilmer Jaime is 28 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

This Communal Bank is called “Nuevo Horizonte” (New Horizon) and located in the neighborhood of Recinto Cachely Grande, which is in the canton of Ventanas. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Wilmer is a farmer who has been growing corn, rice, and beans for 10 years. He buys his supplies at the Olivos Brothers Shopping Center each month and then sells his goods at the fair in the same location.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and compost for his crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. One of his challenges is having to deal with crop diseases. His dream is to have an agribusiness that is well-equipped to perform his work.

Wilmer enjoys playing sports and is fascinated with soccer.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loans.name: Miriam Judith

texts.es:
Miriam Judith tiene 28 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Miriam se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. No enfrenta desafios muy importantes. Su sueño es tener un terreno propio para construir la casa.

Le gusta festejar las fiestas del recinto y bailar.
texts.en:
Miriam Judith is 28 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

This Communal Bank is called “Nuevo Horizonte” (New Horizon) and located in the neighborhood of Recinto Cachely Grande, which is in the canton of Ventanas.  The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  

Miriam is a farmer who specializes in growing corn, rice, and beans.  She buys her supplies at the Olivos Brothers Shopping Center each month and then sells her goods at the fair in the same location.

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and compost for her crops.  With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies.  She does not face any major challenges.  Her dream is to acquire her own land for building a house.

Miriam enjoys celebrating the neighborhood festivals and dancing.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loans.name: Qolquewasi Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se denomina “Qolquewasi” y está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que se reúnen cada treinta días en las oficinas de la Unidad de Microfinazas de la Asociación Arariwa Cusco, Perú.  
   
En esta reunión conocimos a la Sra. Agustina que nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba y ahora radica en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 51 años y tiene una relación y fruto de esta unión tiene cinco hijos. Agusntina es ama de casa que después de hacer sus actividades del hogar tiene que atender la tienda de abarrotes. Ya son 8 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar y cerveza.

Con el préstamo recibido anteriormente ha podido implementar su bodega y además pasar más tiempo con sus hijos, la meta de Agustina es ampliar  su negocio y tener mayores ingresos para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, con el préstamo recibido se realizara la compra de mercadería.

* La Sra. Agustina es la persona que está levantando la mano  en la fotografía.
texts.en:
This group is called “Qolquewasi” and made up of responsible and hardworking individuals. They meet every 30 days at the microfinance offices of Asociación Araiwa in Cusco, Peru.

At this meeting, the Arariwa staff spoke with Sra. Agustina. She says that she was born in the city of Quillabamba and now resides in the city of Cusco. Agustina is 51 years old, in a relationship, and has five children. She is a homemaker and manages a grocery store after she completes her household chores. Agustina has been in business for eight years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. She is taking this opportunity to request a loan so that she can buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, and beer.

With the previous loan she received, Agustina was able to keep her store in operation. Despite spending more time with her children, Agustina has a goal of expanding her business so that she can generate more income to provide her family a better quality of life. With the loan she is receiving, she will be able to buy merchandise.

*In the photograph, Sra. Agustina is the woman with her hand raised.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, beer, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 57 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 7 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chompas, ella vende chompas en forma independiente y lo lleva al distrito de Apurímac y también se dedica a la venta de golosinas, ella vende en la puerta de colegio de la ciudad de Cusco, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m,y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de chompas y venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lana para hacer las chompas y golosinas como caramelos, chupetes y galletas.
                                                         
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the “YAHUAR MAQUI” Communal Bank. The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

The borrower is 57 years old. She is a widow and has 7 children. She alternates her daily chores with her sweaters selling activity. She works independently, taking her sweaters to the Apurímac district. On top of this she also sells snacks at the gates of a school in Cusco. She works form 7 am to 32 pm, and thanks to these activities she succeeded in providing for her children. She would like to increase and improve her sweaters and snack selling activities. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy wool to knit the sweaters and snacks such as candy, lollipops and cookies.

She is happy about the loan and she commits to complying with the repayments of her dues.

loans.use: To buy wool and snacks such as candy, lollipops and cookies.

loans.name: Jofre Descarte

texts.es:
Jofre Descarte tiene 42 años, es casado vive con la esposa, padres y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NUEVO HORIZONTE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely Grande, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Jofre se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Comercial "Hnos. Olivos" cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abonos para los cultivos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar una casa y una finca.

Le gusta jugar futbool.
texts.en:
Jofre Descarte is 42 and he lives with his wife, parents and children in Ventanas canton.

The communal bank branch is called Nuevo Horizonte (New Horizon) and it’s located in the Cachely Grande neighborhood, of Ventanas province.  It focuses on farming short season crops such as corn, rice, and beans.

Jofre plants corn, rice and beans and he does his buying in the Hnos Olivos (Olivos Brothers) store each month, and sells his crops at the market there as well.

He is requesting a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer for the fields and the financing will help him economically to fill his needs.  Problems with the farming are diseases in the crops. 

 His dream is to buy a house and a farm and he likes to play soccer.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer for his fields

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, ella es comerciante de ropa nueva, desde hace tres años está en el negocio ubicado en el mercado municipal, y en ocasiones sale a vender de forma ambulante, este negocio lo administra por iniciativa propia, siendo su principal ocupación de la que recibe ganancias para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de prendas de vestir para la temporada de Junio a Agosto, invirtiéndolo en blusas, faldas, ropa interior y para niños, esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar el inventario y las ventas.
El propósito de María es tener el negocio rentable, que le ayude a aumentar sus ganancias y satisfacer las necesidades de su familia, realizándose como comerciante de éxito.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and their children. She has sold new clothing for three years. Her business is located in the town market, and on occasion she goes out to do traveling sales. María runs this business on her own, and it is her main occupation for earning income to cover household expenses.

She is asking for a loan to buy clothing for the June to August season, and she will invest in blouses, skirts, underwear and children's clothing. This investment will help her to improve her inventory and her sales.

María's goal is to have a profitable business that helps her to increase her earnings and meet her family's needs by becoming a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy clothing: blouses, skirts, underwear and children's clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YAHUAR MAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 52 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también es director de su grupo musical llamado Machupicchu, el trabaja con eventos como matrimonios, cumpleaños y bautizos y su esposa trabaja en la tienda de abarrotes, por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de propietario de grupo musical. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche, harinas y fideos y también para implemtar su grupo musical como comprar parlantes.
                                                  
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the “YAHUAR MAQUI” Communal Bank. The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

The borrower is 52 years old, he is married and has 3 children. He alternates his daily chores with two activities: he runs a general store and he is also the director of a musical group, Machupicchu, which is contracted for events such as weddings, birthday parties and christenings; his wife works in their general store. Thanks to these two activities, he succeeds on providing for his children. He wants to enlarge his grocery store and to improve his musical group. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy products for the general store such as rice, sugar, milk, flour and noodles; he will also use part of the loan to buy loudspeakers for his musical group.

He is happy about the loan and he commits to complying with the repayments of his dues.

loans.use: To buy products for the general store such as rice, sugar, milk, flour and noodles, and to buy loudspeakers for his musical group.

loans.name: Luis Sandro

texts.es: El señor Luis Sandro, antes vivía en la sierra vendió todo y se vino a vivir con sus padres y hermanaos, a la ciudad de ICA, el se dedica al transporte de carga, ya tiene 3 años trabajando en este rubro, el señor luís es soltero no tiene carga familiar, el préstamo que esta solicitando es para darle mantenimiento a su vehiculo, comprar batería, reforzamiento de barandas del camión y 4 muelles, para  así poder brindar mejor servicio, su sueño a futuro es tener una familia y con el tiempo adquirir otro camión , luís esta muy agradecido con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Luís Sandro used to live in the mountains.  He sold everything and came to live with his parents and siblings in the city of Ica.  Luís' business is transporting cargo.  He has been working in this business for three years.  Luís is single and doesn't have any dependents.  He will use the loan that he is requesting to have maintenance work done on his vehicle.  He will buy a battery, have the rails on his truck strengthened and buy four springs.  This will enable him to provide a better service.

Luís' dream for the future is to start his own family and, over time, acquire another truck.  He is very grateful for the trust that is being placed in him.

loans.use: to have maintenance work done on his vehicle; to buy a battery, springs, etc.

loans.name: Dora Nelly

texts.es:
A sus 42 años de edad y después de trabajar durante en talleres de confecciones, Dora decidió comprar una máquina de coser para realizar desde su casa trabajos propios en su tiempo libre que le permitan generar ingresos adicionales para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, así como cumplir sus sueño de tener su propia casa.
 
Dora necesita de un préstamo para comprar materia prima como telas e insumos como hilos, botones, entre otros, que le permitan realizar mayor producción e incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
After having spent many years working in sewing workshops, at the age of 42 Dora decided buying a sewing machine to work on her own in her house, making clothes in her free time to earn additional money in order to improve her family’s and her own standards of living, as well as to achieve her dream of having a house of her own.

Dora is requesting a loan to buy materials such as fabric, threads and buttons, among other things, in order to create more clothes and consequently increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy fabric, threads and buttons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise and to have some money for personal use.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es: Ana Rosa tiene su negocio que es la venta de especies. Tiene más de 9 años con esta actividad, con mucho sacrificio ha logrado proporcionar a su familia el alimento diario. Ella se levanta temprano pues tiene que realizar los quehaceres del hogar y además arreglar las cosas para su negocio. Es por este motivo que solicita este crédito para la compra de bolsas, salsa de tomate, acido, salsa inglesa  y además candelas.
texts.en: Ana Rosa sells spices, an activity she has been engaged in for more than 9 years. She has succeeded in providing her family with their daily necessities through great sacrifices. She gets up early to take care of the housework and to arrange everything for her shop. The loan she is requesting will be invested in her activity: she will use it to buy bags, tomato sauce, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce and candles.

loans.use: To buy bags, tomato sauce, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce and candles

loans.name: Richard Francisco

texts.es: El joven Richard  es soltero, tiene 25 años de edad,  Richard estudia Administración industrial  en un instituto de prestigio, Richard eligió esta profesión porque  es su vocación, ademas es una persona responsable,puntual y trabaja en equipo, también sabe que le generara mejores ingresos económicos, hoy en día Richard trabaja los fines de semana como albañil, pero Richard sabe que todo esfuerzo es recompensado, Su sueño de es brindarle a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida y de alguna forma devolverle a ellos todo lo que hicieron por él, con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para pagar su matrícula y prácticas profesionales. Sabemos que Richard   cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Richard is 25 years old and single.  He is studying Industrial Administration in a prestigious institute.  Richard chose this profession because it is his vocation.  He is a responsible, punctual person who is a good team player and he knows that this will make him better income.  Currently, Richard is working as a construction worker on weekends but he knows that all effort has its rewards.

Richard's dream is to provide his parents with a better quality of life and, in some way, to pay them back for everything they have done for him.  With the goal of continuing to grow, he has requested a new loan to pay his registration fees and for his internship.  We know that Richard will achieve his goals with a lot of work and effort and that Edaprospo's loans will help him.

loans.use: to pay his registration fees and for his internship

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge Alberto se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que siempre está buscando la forma de salir adelante. Por lo que no es la primera vez que solicita financiamientos, pues ha sido muy gratificante para él. A pesar de su edad, siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre trabajador y luchador.  El sale todos los días a vender sus productos. Así con el financiamiento podrá comprar leche, crema, cuajada, queso y otros productos.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto sells dairy products.  He has been in this business for more than eight years.  He is always looking for ways to get ahead in life.

This is not the first loan that Jorge Alberto has requested a loan and it has been very rewarding for him.  In spite of his age, he has always been noted as being a hard-working and tenacious man.  He goes out every day to sell his products.  He will use this loan to buy milk, cream, curd, cheese and other products.

loans.use: to buy milk, cream, curd, cheese and other products

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria De Los Ángeles tiene 59 años, esta Señora es muy emprendedora y disfruta mucho de su actividad como es la ofrecer el servicio de costura. Hace más de 42 años que tiene este negocio. Ella sabe que la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le están solicitando una gran variedad de prendas de vestir. Maria tiene muchos clientes como jóvenes, niños, adolecentes y público en general ella siempre busca la forma de comunicarse con ellos para complacer lo que le solicitan. El crédito es para la compra de tela, zipper, agujas, tijeras, hilos de todos colores entre otros.
texts.en: Maria De Los Ángeles is 59 years old.  This lady is very entrepreneurial and really enjoys her business which is offering sewing services.  She has been in the business for 42 years.  She knows that her customers are always requesting a large variety of clothes.  Maria has many customers, including young people, children, teenagers and the general public.  She is always looking for ways of communicating with them so that she can satisfy them by providing them with what they requested.  She will use her loan to buy fabric, zippers, needles, scissors, different colored threads and other items.

loans.use: to buy fabric, zippers, needles, scissors, different colored threads and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients and merchandise and to fix up her kiosk.

loans.name: Karayba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 07 janvier 1997. Il est composé constitué de neuf femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce

Madame Fatou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 49  ans. Elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant. Elle a aussi en sa charge deux autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de petit déjeuner. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, car l'ayant pratiquer depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront de participer à la prise en charge des frais de scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
The solidarity group was created on January 7, 1997. It is comprised of nine women who live in the same district. Their main work involves small-scale commerce. 

Ms. Fatou, who appears at the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the group’s official. She is 49 years old, married, and the mother of one child. She is also responsible for two other children entrusted to her by her parents. Fatou is active in selling breakfasts. She has good experience in this business domain because she has worked at it for several years. 

This loan will enable her to bolster her capital and to develop her business further. The profits will allow her to help cover the cost of schooling the children.

loans.use: to buy provisions for making breakfasts

loans.name: San Miguel De Pando Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Miguel D. Pando trabaja con EDAPROSPO desD. hace 8 meses, tiene como integrantes a 8 socios emprendedores y muy carismáticos.
Marcelino es un joven microempresario, natural D. la ciudad D. Huánuco, a la edad 18 años decidió llegar a Lima, buscando un mejor futuro, actualmente vive con su padre, el cual se encuentra muy enfermo, Marcelino trabajó 2 años como ayudante D. carpintería y es ahí donD. deciD. independizarse y emprender su negocio D. producción D. muebles D. madera (camas, roperos, reposteros, mesas, sillas, etc.), además realiza ventas D. productos D. Omnilife, su mayor sueño es tener un local propio donD. pueda realizar la producción D. sus muebles y comprar una casa para darle una mejor calidad D. vida a su familia.
El préstamo solicitado será invertido en la compra D. maderas e insumos para la fabricación D. muebles.
texts.en:
The 'San Miguel D. Pando' group has been working with EDAPROSPO for eight months.  The group's eight members are all entrepreneurial and very charismatic.

Marcelino is a young man and small businessman who is from the city of Huánuco.  At the age of 18 he decided to come to Lima in search of a better future.  He currently lives with his father who is very sick.

Marcelino worked for two years as a carpenter's assistant.  He decided to start working for himself and set up his own business making wooden furniture (beds, wardrobes, kitchen cupboards, tables, chairs, etc.)  He also sells Omnilife products.  Marcelino's biggest dream is to own his own premises where he can make his furniture and to buy a house so that he can proviD. his family with a better quality of life.

Marcelino will invest his money in buying wood and supplies for making furniture.

loans.use: to buy wood and supplies for making furniture

loans.name: Dole Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 07 janvier 1997. Il est  composé de huit femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Aramata qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant. Elle a aussi en sa charge trois autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (nourriture).
texts.en:
The solidarity group was created on January 7, 1997. It is comprised of eight women who live in the same district. Their main work involves small-scale commerce.

Ms. Aramata, who is at the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the group's official. She is 43 years old, married, and the mother of one child. She also supports three other children entrusted to her by her parents. She is active in selling vegetables. She has good experience in this business domain in which she has been working for several years. 

This loan will enable her to bolster her capital and to develop her business further. The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (food).

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Maria Auxiliadora tiene 62 años, tiene 2 hijos que trabajan de manera independiente, ella cuenta con una buena clientela, que siempre llega a su vivienda pues saben que ofrecer mercadería en general. Maria se dedica a esto desde hace más de 12 años ella trabaja todos los días y desde muy joven a prendió a ganarse la vida y sufragar los gastos de su hogar. Por lo que no es su primera experiencia con financiamientos, pues han sido necesarios para su negocio. Ella solicita este crédito con el objetivo de comprar perfumes, ropa interior, ropa en general y tratamientos para el cabello y la piel.
texts.en:
Maria Auxiliadora is 62 years old and has two children who both work independently.  Maria has good customers who are always coming to her home as they know that she sells general merchandise.

Maria has been in this business for more than 12 years.  She works every day.  When she was very young she learned to earn a living and cover her household expenses.  This is not Maria's first experience with loans as they have been necessary for her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy perfume, underwear, clothes, and hair and skin treatments.

loans.use: to buy perfume, underwear, clothes, and hair and skin treatments

loans.name: Artemio

texts.es:
Artemio es un hombre trabajador de 52 años de edad que vive con su esposa y dos hijos en una comunidad humilde y pequeña en vías de desarrollo cuyos pobladores son comerciantes o se dedican a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 20 minutos del distrito de Mórrpe en Lambayeque.

Artemio tiene 10 años de experiencia en su trabajo, él se dedica al comercio de verduras de manera ambulatoria o en su propio domicilio. Artemio cuenta con sembríos propios y con clientela fija, que son comerciantes chiclayanos, él tiene muchos deseos de superarse y es por ello que desea invertir en su negocio.

Artemio solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar lenteja de palo y maíz que actualmente se encuentran en temporada de cosechas por su zona. Esto le permitirá aumentar su mercadería y por lo tanto su producción

Artemio es una persona muy conocida en la zona debido a la labor que realiza. Este se ha propuesto acopiar maíz para luego venderlo a un mejor precio. Artemio quiere mejorar su calidad de vida y este préstamo le ayudaría a hacerlo.

Artemio ya ha trabajo con nuestra entidad y goza de un buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
Artemio is a hard-working man, 52 years old, who lives with his wife and two children in a small and humble community which is still developing. Its inhabitants work as merchants, raise animals or work in agriculture. The community is located 20 minutes from the district of Mórrpe in Lambayeque.

Artemio has 10 years of experience with his work. He works selling vegetables as a mobile vendor or from his own home. Artemio has his own crops and has steady customers who are merchants from Chiclayo. He has a great desire to get ahead in life, and for this reason, he wants to invest in his business. 

Artemio is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 Peruvian new soles, in order to buy lentils and corn, which are currently being harvested in his area. This will allow him to expand his stock of merchandise and thus his turnover. 

Artemio is a person who is very well-known in his area because of the work he does. He has decided to store corn so that he can sell it later at a better price. Artemio would like to improve his quality of life, and this loan will help him to do so. 

Artemio has worked with this financial institution in the past and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy lentils and corn which are currently in production.

loans.name: Karayba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 09 juillet 2002. Il est  composé de 14 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Filidie qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 61 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de huit enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge neuf autres enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  son petit commerce de légumes.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group has been created on July 9, 2002. It is composed of 14 women living in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is retail.
Mrs. Filidie, on the right and  raising her hand in the photo, is the group’s leader. She is 61 years old. She is married and the mother of eight. She also has nine other children entrusted to her care by relatives.

Her business is selling vegetables. She has a good experience in this work which she has been doing for years. This loan will allow her to bolster her capital and to  develop her business further. The income will allow her to improve the life conditions of her family (healthcare, food, clothing etc…) and to grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 24 años reside en el caserío de Llanco. Ahí formó su familia junto a Ana, su esposa desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen una hija: Kiarali de 2 años de edad y juntos cuidan de ella en su casa propia. El trabajo de este gran hombre es variado; desde niño se dedicó a la agricultura, principal sustento para su familia, en la que lleva 9 años sembrando arveja y papa. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, es el respeto que recibe de entre los demás agricultores; ya que comenzó desde muy joven en el negocio. Además recibe el apoyo de su esposa, quien cría chanchos, vacas y toros, que enseba y vende a un buen precio; “somos un gran equipo”, afirma Luis con mucho orgullo. A la vez menciona que; los días viernes, sábado y domingo, tiene un negocio de compra y venta de verduras en los diferentes mercados de la ciudad de Pichanaki (selva central peruana). Desde entonces le va muy bien ya que no existen esos productos en el lugar. Para el futuro desea juntar dinero para poder construir una mejor casa y comprarse una moto para incursionar en el trasporte público. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Los ángeles de Llanco” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde está muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Luis de recibir su apoyo, invertirá la mitad del dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja, varios sacos de abono orgánico para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de papa; asimismo desea comprar verduras para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en: Luis is 24 and lives in the town of Llanco. He has been married to Ana for 3 years, and they have one daughter, Kiarali, who is 2.  The family lives together in their own house. Luis is very hard-working; he has worked in agriculture since he was a child, and this is his household's principal source of income.  He has been growing peas and potatoes for the last 9 years.  Luis enjoys the solidarity among local farmers.  Ana helps Luis to raise pigs, cows and bulls, which fetch good market prices.  Luis proudly notes that “we make a great team.”  On weekends, Luis also sells produce in markets of Pichanaki (in the central Peruvian Amazon); sales are brisk in this very remote region.  Luis plans to make future housing improvements and to buy a motorcycle for transport.  He is a member of the communal lender “Los ángeles de Llanco” and this is his third credit with MFP, where he is very grateful for the lender's support and pleased to have financial access to grow his business. He is committed to prompt repayment, consistent with his prior track record. Luis plans to invest half the credit to buy crop seed, sacks of organic fertilizer for his potato fields; he will also buy other vegetables for his business.

loans.use: to buy crop seeds, fertilizer; and vegetables for his business

loans.name: La Proyeccion De San Jose Group

texts.es: L. señora Rocio pertenece al alcom L. Proyeccion D. San Jose conformado por 11 socios elL. ocupa el cargo D. secretaria, tiene 38 años es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos los cuales son menores D. edad, elL. se dedica a L. venta D. productos D. belleza pero tambien junto a su esposo tiene un taller en donD. realizan servicos D. costura. Empezo en el negocio D. venta D. productos por una amiga que L. inscribio actualmente tiene varios clientes y realiza buenas ventas. Su deseo es poder incrementar su negocio y tambien ayudar a su esposo en el taller para asi poder dar estudios a sus hijos. El prestamo lo invirtio en L. caompra D. productos D. belleza para poder stoquearse por campaña.
texts.en: Rocio is a member of L. Proyeccion D. San Jose which has 11 members.  Rocio is 38, a secretary, is married and has two young children.  She sells beauty products and also helps her husband run a sewing workshop. A friend helped Rocio begin her beauty sales business, and she now has many customers, and her sales have have been brisk. She hopes to continue to grow her business to proviD. a solid future for her children.  Rocio plans to use this loan to buy more product stock inventory for resale.

loans.use: to buy additional product inventory

loans.name: Sohoué

texts.fr: Née le 10 septembre 1952 au Bénin, Sohoué est une veuve qui vit seule avec un de ses enfants. Sohoué a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés dont un reste encore à sa charge. Sohoué n'a fréquenté que l'école primaire. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Sohoué mène comme activité depuis près de trente ans, la vente de bois de chauffage à son domicile. Parallèlement à cette activité, Sohoué vend de la glace. Grâce au revenu que lui génère ses activités, Sohoué assure convenablement les différentes charges de sa famille. Sohoué  s’approvisionne dans le plus grand marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour améliorer son niveau de vie et son revenu, Sohoué sollicite pour une première fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
Born in Benin on September 10, 1952, Sohoué is a widow who lives alone with one of her children. Sohoué has four children, who all went to school; one still depends on her.
Sohoué only went to primary school. To support herself and her children, Sohoué has been retailing firewood from her home for almost 30 years. In parallel to this business, Sohoué sells ice. Thanks to the revenues generated by her activities, Sohoué is able to properly provide for her family.
Sohoué gets her supplies from Benin's largest market. In the pursuit of customer satisfaction and to improve her standard of living and income, Sohoué is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the first time.

loans.use: to buy firewood.

loans.name: Bousso Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 17 février 2001. Ledit groupe est  constitué de dix huit femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Diarra qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 57 ans. Elle est mariée sans enfants. 

Elle fait un petit commerce d'huile de palme. 

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  son activité de vente de palme afin de prétendre à des bénéfices plus importants.

Les profits générés  lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group has been created on February 17, 2001. The group is composed of 18 women from the same neighborhood. Their main business activity is retail.

Mrs. Diarra, on the right in the photo raising her hand, is the group’s leader. She is 57 years old. She is married without children. She sells palm oil. This loan will allow her to bolster her capital and to grow her business in order to achieve a higher income. The generated profits will allow her to improve the life conditions of her family (healthcare, food, clothing etc...) as well as increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy palm oil

loans.name: Euphrasie

texts.fr: Née le 09 mars 1951 au Bénin, Euphrasie  est mariée à un certain Thomas. Le couple à quatre enfants dont deux restent encore à leur  charge. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Euphrasie n’a fréquenté que l’école primaire. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Euphrasie vend des tissus et des tenues (hommes et dames) depuis près de vingt ans. Euphrasie  achète ses produits au  Bénin et au Togo, Etat voisin du Bénin. Mais Euphrasie  vend ses vêtements dans sa boutique et parfois par le système de distribution. En vue d'élever le niveau de son activité et de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Euphrasie sollicite pour la première  fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé.
texts.en:
Born in Benin on March 9, 1951, Euphrasie is married to a man named Thomas. The couple has four children, two of whom still depend on them. All the children attend school. The couple provides for the various needs of the household together.
Euphrasie only attended primary school. To support herself and her family, Euphrasie has been selling fabrics and outfits (for gentlemen and ladies) for almost twenty years. Euphrasie purchases her products in Benin and Togo, a neighbor country to Benin. She retails clothing in her shop and sometimes through the distribution system.
In order to increase her level of activity and to better satisfy her customers' needs, Euphrasie is requesting for the first time ALIDé's financial support.

loans.use: to buy clothing and fabrics.

loans.name: Yuliya

texts.en:
Yuliya is married with an 18-year-old daughter. Yuliya lives in Energodar and sells seeds, agricultural chemicals and other farming products in the central market of her hom town. She owns a big vending location and is an experienced vendor who offers a reasonable pricing policy to her customers. She has learned many tricks of her trade in the past eight years.

Currently, Yuliya has already invested 80,000 Grivnyas in inventory. Her turnover amounts to 30,000 Grivnyas. Net profit is about 8,000 Grivnyas a month. Yuliya has big potential and is full of business ideas and projects. She is hoping to generate sufficient income to reinvest it in further expansion of the range of items she offers for sale, e.g., irrigation units and sprayers.

Yuliya is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnyas to purchase fertilizers, seeds and sprayers. She can quickly respond to different new trends in her business which, in addition to high demand on these types of products, has benefited her venture.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds and sprayers.

loans.name: Loetitia Viviane

texts.fr: Née en 1943 au Bénin, Loetitia Viviane est une veuve qui  vit  seule. Loetitia Viviane  à un enfant scolarisé, à sa charge. Loetitia Viviane n’a jamais été  à l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de  l’enfant à charge, Loetitia Viviane mène comme activité depuis près de douze ans la vente  des tissus.  Grâce  au revenu que lui génère son activité, Loetitia Viviane  assure convenablement les différentes charges de sa famille. Loetitia Viviane s’approvisionne  au Togo, Etat voisin du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour améliorer son niveau de vie et son revenu, Loetitia Viviane sollicite pour une troisième  fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Born in 1943 in Benin, Loetitia Viviane is a widow living on her own. She has a dependent child in school. Loetitia Viviane never attended school. In order to provide for herself and   the child in her care, she has been selling fabrics for over dozen years. Thanks to the income from this activity, she manages to provide for her household in a dignified way. Loetitia Viviane stocks up in Togo, the country neighboring Benin. With the goal of meeting customer demand and improving her income and life conditions, Loetitia Viviane is seeking a third loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Wendy Santana

texts.es:
La señora Wendy esta agradecida por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual pudo surtir su negocio y con las ganancias pudo adquirir un puesto para la venta de alimentos. 
Esta solicitando su cooperación en este préstamo ya que necesita comprar inmobiliario, que es sillas, mesas y  materia prima para iniciar a trabajar en su nuevo puesto. 
Doña Wendy pagara el crédito con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio. 
Desea que su negocio este mejor acondicionada para darles un buen servicio a su clientes y que su familia tenga una mejor vida y poder darles los estudios necesario a sus dos hijos.
texts.en: Wendy is pleased that a prior loan helped her to grow her business, allowing her to use profits to open a food stand.  She now seeks credit to buy chairs, tables and other materials to outfit her now food stall and allow her clients to enjoy her food in greater comfort.  Wendy plans to pay off her loan with profits from her new business.  She hopes to better provide for her family, allowing her two children to study.

loans.use: Compra de mercancía para el negocio

loans.name: Koutedjomboulo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 07 janvier 1997. Il est  constitué de 13 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame PENDA à droite de la photo levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge deux autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de l'huile de palme. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The solidarity group was created on January 7, 1997. It is composed of 13 women living in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is retail.

Mrs. Penda, on the right of the picture with her hand raised, is the group's leader. She is 51 years old. She is married and a mother of two. She also has in her care two other children, who were entrusted to her by their parents.

She is active retailing palm oil. She has a good experience in this field, since she has been practicing in it for several years.

This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and to better grow her business.

Profits will make it possible for her to improve the family's standard of living (health, food, clothing, etc.) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy palm oil.

loans.name: Clémentine

texts.fr: Née le 08 Avril 1982 au Bénin, Clémentine est mariée à Victor un mécanicien. Le couple à deux  enfants tous scolarisés et leur charge. Le couple vit ensemble avec leurs enfants. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assumées  par Clémentine et son mari. Pour participer efficacement aux devoirs de mère de famille qui est le sien, Clémentine vend  depuis cinq ans, des poissons fumés dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. A côté de cette activité qui lui génère de revenu, Clémentine vend des chaussures et des tissus. Dans le but de rehausser son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Clémentine sollicite auprès de ALIDé un troisième prêt. Clémentine avait obtenu antérieurement deux crédits qui ont été tous bien remboursés.
texts.en: Born on April 8, 1982 in Benin, Clementine is married to Victor who is a mechanic. The couple takes care of their two children who are in school. The various household expenses are the responsibility of Clementine and her husband. In order to effectively participate in her responsibilities, Clementine has been selling for the past five years smoked fish at one of the markets in Benin. On the side of this income-generating business, she also sells shoes and fabric. With the goal to re-stimulate her business and to better respond to client demand, Clementine is requesting her third loan. Clementine has already received two loans which were both properly reimbursed.

loans.use: to purchase baskets of fish, fabric and shoes.

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Del Progreso Group

texts.es: La señora Martha tiene 55 años D. edad es casada y tiene 07 hijos D. los cuales solo uno vive en casa con ella, desD. hace un año se dedica a la produccion D. bolsas D. basura al inicio ella tenia una pequeña bodega pero con el tiempo y al ver que no tenia muy buenos ingresos decidio cambiar D. rubro y dedicarse a la elaboracion D. bolsas,primero con sus ahorros se compro una maquina selladora D. plastico. El prestamo lo invertira para aumentar su capital y comprar insumos. Hasta el momento a logrado comprar otra maquina y su sueño es poder tener su empresa D. plasticos.
texts.en:
Martha is 55 years old.  She is married and has seven children, only one of whom still lives at home with her.  For one year, Martha has been making trash bags.  She used to have a small grocery store but, over time, she saw that she wasn't making very good profits and so decided to change her business activity and start making bags.  She used her savings to buy a machine for sealing plastic.

Martha will invest her loan in increasing her capital and buying supplies.  She has managed to buy another machine and her dream is to own a plastics company.

loans.use: to invest in buying supplies for making trash bags

loans.name: Adonon

texts.fr: Née en 1973 au Bénin, Adonon  est mariée à un certain Marcellin. Le couple à trois  enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur  charge. Adonon vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Adonon assure avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Adonon  n’a jamais été à l’école. Pour satisfaire ses besoins ainsi que ceux de ses enfants, Adonon vend des calebasses, des poteries et de façon secondaire, du maïs. Parallèlement à cette activité, Adonon vend des plantes de la médecine traditionnelle.  Adonon s’approvisionne dans l’un des marchés  du Nord du  Bénin. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l’aidant à couvrir les différentes charges de sa famille. Dans l’optique de rehausser davantage le niveau de son activité et d’accroître son profit,  Adonon  sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les  deux premiers crédits dont Adonon  avait bénéficié ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Born in Benin in 1973, Adonon is married to Marcellin. The couple has three children, who all attend school and depend on them financially. Adonon lives with her husband and children. She takes care of the various family expenses with her husband. She never went to school.
To meet her needs and her children's, Adonon sells gourds, earthenware, and as a secondary activity, corn. In parallel to this activity, she sells traditional medicinal plants. She gets her supplies from a market in northern Benin. This business generates revenues which help her cover her family's various expenses.
With the objective to further raise her activity level and to increase her profits, Adonon is requesting a third loan from ALIDé. The first two loans she benefited from were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy earthenware and medicinal plants.

loans.name: Julienne

texts.fr: Née en 1973 au Bénin, Julienne est mariée à un Ingénieur hydropique du nom de Randolph. Le couple a six  enfants  tous scolarisés. Grâce au revenu que lui génère son activité,  Julienne contribue aux différentes dépenses de la famille. Julienne a arrêté les classes au cours primaire et a appris ensuite la couture, une activité qu'elle mène depuis environs quatre ans. Dans son atelier, Julienne vend divers articles de merceries. A coté de cette activité, Julienne vend de la nourriture (riz, pâte de maïs accompagné de sauce. C’est dans le plus grand marché du Bénin, que Julienne s’approvisionne. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour améliorer son niveau de vie, Julienne sollicite pour une deuxième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Julienne was born in Benin in 1973. She is married to Randolph, an hydrologic engineer. They have six children, all attending school. Thanks to the income from her activity, Julienne contributes to the various household expenses. She left school after elementary education and then learnt the dressmaking craft, which has been her activity for the past four years. Julienne also sells haberdashery out of her workshop. In addition to that activity, she sells food products, such as rice and corn pasta with sauce. She gets her supplies at the largest market of Benin. Eager to satisfy her clients and improve her living standard, Julienne came to the microfinance institution Alidé and applied for her second loan.

loans.use: to buy haberdashery (sewing thread, buttons, etc.).

loans.name: Simona Del Carmen

texts.es:
Simona tiene su propio negocio, en la venta de ropa con más de veinte cuatro años en las ventas, hoy en día comienza a invertir en la pulpería ya que durante todos estos años ha viajado a los departamentos a vender parte de su mercadería lo cual desea establecerse solo en la pulpería, pues anteriormente vendía golosinas, pero ahora le introdujo parte de su capital.
El cual ha logrado atreves de su trabajo, esfuerzo y financiamiento que Afodenic le ha dado en catorce ciclos, en donde ha venido pagando en tiempo y forma para obtener este beneficio ya que son a plazos accesible, lo cual, cubre sus gastos personales.
Simona con este nuevo préstamo comprara: tres bidones de aceite, tres quintales de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, golosinas, coca cola, productos lácteos, ya que son de mucha demanda. Sus planes es lograr la clientela, para que su negocio pueda ir creciendo en productos.
texts.en:
Simona owns her own business.  For more than twenty-four years she has sold clothes.  She is currently investing in a grocery store because over all these years, she has traveled to other departments to sell part of her merchandise and she would like to concentrate her business solely in her grocery store.  In the past, she used to sell candies but she has now put some of her capital in the store.

Simona has achieved everything through her own hard work and effort and loans which she has received from Afodenic over fourteen loan cycles.  She has always repaid her loans on time and in full since the instalments are affordable.  She has been able to cover her personal expenses.

Simona will use this new loan to buy three containers of oil, three 100lb bags of rice, sugar, beans, candies, Coca Cola and dairy products since she has a lot of demand for them.  Her plans are to obtain customers so that her business can continue growing and offering more products.

loans.use: to invest in buying basic grains, dairy products and candies to improve her sales

loans.name: Alcanzando Nuestras Metas Group

texts.es: La señora Milagors pertenece al alcom Alcanzando Nuestras Metas el cual se encuentra en su cuarto ciclo su cargo es D. tesorera en el grupo. La señora Milagros tiene 34 años y tiene 02 hijos que son menores D. edad, en la actualidad se dedica a la venta D. ropa a pedido su deseo es poder reaperturar su tienda ya que por diversos motivos tubo que cerrarla. Con este negocio ella a podido ayudar a su esposo con los gastos D. casa. El prestamo lo invertira en la compra D. ropa ya que es campaña del dia del padre y tiene varios pedidos.
texts.en:
Milagros is a member of the 'Alcanzando Nuestras Metas' (Reaching our Goals) community bank which is in its fourth loan cycle.  She is the group's treasurer.

Milagros is 34 years old and has two dependent children.  She currently sells clothes to order.  Her wish is to be able to reopen her store as, for various reasons, she had to close it.  Through her business, Milagros has been able to help her husband with their household expenses.  She will invest her loan in buying clothes since Fathers Day is approaching and she has several orders.

loans.use: to invest in buying merchandise

loans.name: Dakar Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 17 février 2001. Ledit groupe est  constitué de seize  femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Cependant il y a une des femmes du prénom DIENABA qui fait partie du groupe et n'a pas contracté de prêt et qui figure sure la photo. Ce qui fait qu'elle sont 16 sur la photo alors qu'elles sont 15 à prendre de crédit. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Fatou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 81 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de dix enfants. 

Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, car étant pratiquer depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, scolarité etc.…).
texts.en:
The solidarity group was created February 17, 2001. It consists of 16 women who all live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is small trade.

Mrs. Fatou, seen on the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the head of the group. She is 81 years old, married, and the mother of ten children. She sells vegetables and has a good command of her activity, having done this for several years.

This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and further expand her activities. She will use the profits to improve her family’s living conditions (healthcare, food, education, etc.).

One of the group members, Dieneba, did not seek a loan despite appearing in the photo. This explains why 15 members are requesting a group loan although there are 16 members in the picture.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Missira Samba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Missira Samba  a été créé le 06 Décembre lors l’inauguration du dit banc villageois. Il compte 28 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles  font toutes le petit commerce.
